Themis AI Logo
Themis AI
1-10
2021
The team at Themis AI has implemented more than 5 years of foundational research into a software framework that automatically estimates uncertainty for any ML model. Unpredictable variations in model output quality have led to a reluctance of users to accept AI as part of their lives and integrate it into workflows. Uncertainty estimation is a necessary process that addresses this issue. In short, an understanding of model reliability is needed for proper quality assurance. Capsa allows ML models to recognize when they provide improper results and self-regulate.Themis AI was founded in 2021. The company is an MIT CSAIL spin-off with a founding team that includes Prof. Daniela Rus, Alexander Amini, and Elaheh Ahmadi.

Biolexis Therapeutics Logo
Biolexis Therapeutics
1-10
2021
Biolexis Therapeutics is a biotech company founded by two veterans of both small molecule drug development and life science startups. Cancer biologist Dr. David Bearss is an expert in small-molecule drug development and the use of genetic model systems in drug discovery while Dr. Hariprasad Vankayalapati, a medicinal chemist, brings extensive knowledge and experience in identifying and developing lead candidates for drug discovery. Together, these world-renowned scientists have five decades of wet-lab research and therapeutic development and were pioneers in utilizing computational tools in small molecule discovery. A culmination of their work together and individually, Biolexis takes an unparalleled, chemical-biological approach to accelerate drug discovery. Utilizing our proprietary wet-lab data and our empirically developed AI/ML predictive platform, Moleculern™, Biolexis is able to rapidly discovery and development novel clinical candidates for cancers, immune-mediated, neurodegenerative, auto-immune and inflammatory indications. Moleculern™ uses laboratory-generated molecular data to train and test a set of protein structures, processed through deep learning, cutting-edge ML tools, and transformed into accurate structural models by mapping hot-spots, computing ligand properties and building accurate empirical models. Our process produces active, safe, and efficacious novel chemical entities while reducing costs, accelerating the timeline and increasing the probability of success in clinical trials.

Themis AI Logo
Themis AI
1-10
2021
The team at Themis AI has implemented more than 5 years of foundational research into a software framework that automatically estimates uncertainty for any ML model. Unpredictable variations in model output quality have led to a reluctance of users to accept AI as part of their lives and integrate it into workflows. Uncertainty estimation is a necessary process that addresses this issue. In short, an understanding of model reliability is needed for proper quality assurance. Capsa allows ML models to recognize when they provide improper results and self-regulate.Themis AI was founded in 2021. The company is an MIT CSAIL spin-off with a founding team that includes Prof. Daniela Rus, Alexander Amini, and Elaheh Ahmadi.

Biolexis Therapeutics Logo
Biolexis Therapeutics
1-10
2021
Biolexis Therapeutics is a biotech company founded by two veterans of both small molecule drug development and life science startups. Cancer biologist Dr. David Bearss is an expert in small-molecule drug development and the use of genetic model systems in drug discovery while Dr. Hariprasad Vankayalapati, a medicinal chemist, brings extensive knowledge and experience in identifying and developing lead candidates for drug discovery. Together, these world-renowned scientists have five decades of wet-lab research and therapeutic development and were pioneers in utilizing computational tools in small molecule discovery. A culmination of their work together and individually, Biolexis takes an unparalleled, chemical-biological approach to accelerate drug discovery. Utilizing our proprietary wet-lab data and our empirically developed AI/ML predictive platform, Moleculern™, Biolexis is able to rapidly discovery and development novel clinical candidates for cancers, immune-mediated, neurodegenerative, auto-immune and inflammatory indications. Moleculern™ uses laboratory-generated molecular data to train and test a set of protein structures, processed through deep learning, cutting-edge ML tools, and transformed into accurate structural models by mapping hot-spots, computing ligand properties and building accurate empirical models. Our process produces active, safe, and efficacious novel chemical entities while reducing costs, accelerating the timeline and increasing the probability of success in clinical trials.

Rytr
1-10
2021
Rytr is a startup that uses artificial intelligence to generate personalized and high-quality text content for its users. We leverage advanced natural language processing models trained on massive amounts of text to automatically produce articles, blog posts, product descriptions, and other text formats on virtually any topic specified by the user. The process begins with the user providing Rytr with a brief natural language description of the desired topic. Our algorithms then search thousands of trusted sources on the web to collect relevant facts, statistics, and insights. Finally, the intelligent software synthesizes all of this information into a cohesive, grammatically correct, and engaging text that is ready to be published. A major advantage of Rytr is its ability to generate text with a style and vocabulary similar to that written by humans. This makes the content more natural and enjoyable to read. Additionally, the system can produce completely original content on virtually any topic in a matter of seconds, saving users a significant amount of time. Here are some of the key features of Rytr: Personalized content: Rytr generates text that is tailored to the specific needs and preferences of each user. High quality: The content generated by Rytr is grammatically correct, well-structured, and engaging. Variety of formats: Rytr can generate text in a variety of formats, including articles, blog posts, product descriptions, and more. Time-saving: Rytr can produce content in a matter of seconds, freeing up users to focus on other tasks. HATO Medical Technologies Logo
HATO Medical Technologies
1-10
Dec 31, 2020
Imagine a world where 32% of all deaths could be prevented with accurate and timely diagnoses. Unfortunately, misdiagnoses of cardiovascular disease (CD) are all too common in pre-specialist settings. Often, the first test to investigate the heart of a potential CD patient is an electrocardiogram (ECG) performed and analyzed by non-specialists. But what if these healthcare professionals had access to a tool that could make interpreting ECGs easy and accurate? Our survey of health professionals revealed that less than half felt confident interpreting ECGs, 60% found it difficult to diagnose based on ECG recordings and only 2% trusted the suggestions from their current device. HATO utilizes artificial intelligence (AI) to analyze electrocardiogram (ECG) recordings in real-time and provide accurate and timely diagnoses of cardiovascular diseases. Our agnostic software solution utilizes deep learning to quickly identify and understand abnormalities in the heart, and agnostic software provides healthcare professionals with a real-time view of the patient's heart to assist in locating abnormalities and reacting quickly in critical situations. This helps to ensure rapid and accurate decision-making for appropriate patient visitation, triage, and treatment, as well as for healthcare professionals who may not have extensive knowledge in cardiology.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), B2B, Big Data, Health Care, Machine Learning, Software
Odense, Syddanmark, Denmark
We enable everyone to become top-tier cardiologists with our next-gen ECG analysis software platform
125,671
5250
hatomedicaltechnologies.com
European Union (EU), Nordic Countries, Scandinavia

Adara is a set of e-commerce softwares that increase conversion rates, automate processes, and improve customer experience,using AI. We have already launched our first software, Adara MetaMind. It is a software that automatically tags products in a e-commerce using computer vision, saving brands time on labeling, reducing errors, and improving their appearance on Google. We currently have 6 clients. We are developing Adara Smart Personalization, a software that customizes e-commerce platforms in various ways, which leads to increased conversion rates. We are planning to launch three new products during 2023 and reach 40 clients from around the world by December 2023. Our team consists of Magdalena Carmona as the CEO, Diego Navarro as the CTO, one developer, and two analysts. We have participated in Startup Chile and Acelera Latam, and we have secured three funds from Corfo.

NLPatent Logo
NLPatent
1-10
2021
NLPatent is a leading AI-based natural language patent search platform used by many Am Law 100 Firms and several Fortune 500 companies. The platform, built from a proprietary fine-tuned Large Language Model, allows users to describe inventions in full sentences, and generates results that are conceptually relevant to the query. NLPatent not only generates results very quickly (seconds vs. hours), but it consistently outperforms human experts. It's an excellent resource for quickly evaluating patentability and conducting more in-depth freedom-to-operate and invalidity searches, often uncovering critical references missed by traditional approaches. NLPatent also offers "AI +Human" outsourcing services through their partnership with Arizona-based search firm, Global Patent Solutions, which can be ordered directly through the NLPatent app. This unique offering combines the expertise of professionally trained searchers with the speed and accuracy of the AI platform, which each analyst is trained to use as part of every search.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Outsourcing, Search Engine, Software, Software Engineering
Toronto, Ontario, Canada

Nyckel makes it easy to auto-label images and text using AI. We say ‘easy’ because trying to do classification through complex “we-do-it-all” AI/ML tools is hard. Especially if you’re not a machine learning expert. That’s why Nyckel built a platform that makes image and text classification easy for everyone. Whether you’re sorting through images, moderating text, or needing real-time content labeling, Nyckel lets you build a custom classifier in just 5 minutes. Just add some sample images/text with the right labels, and the model will train in seconds. You can immediately upload unlabeled content and see if Nyckel identifies it correctly. You can also integrate with our Classification API to auto-label content at scale. Nyckel’s goal is to make AI-powered classification a practical tool for anyone. Learn more at Nyckel.com.

PentaBind Logo
PentaBind
1-10
2021
PentaBind operates in the biotechnology industry, focusing on the innovative use of Generative Artificial Intelligence, Oligos (Aptamers), and Multiomics to advance drug discovery and diagnostics. The company specializes in designing aptamers, which are short strands of synthetic DNA, aimed at improving the safety and efficacy of therapeutic drugs. PentaBind's team comprises bioinformaticians, data scientists, biophysicists, engineers, and synthetic biology experts. Together, they leverage a vast dataset and their expertise to create aptamer-based therapeutic drug assets. PentaBind's approach to drug discovery involves the use of generative AI to design aptamers that can bind to transcription factors, offering a novel method compared to traditional drugs. The company aims to license these assets to pharmaceutical companies through co-development agreements, positioning itself as a key player in the biotech field by harnessing the power of AI for therapeutic innovation.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Bioinformatics, Biotechnology, Health Care, Pharmaceutical

Video Notebook Logo
Video Notebook
1-10
Jan 1, 2021
Video Notebook is a suite of AI-powered apps used by 100K+ students and adult learners to capture important contents of videos, classes, meetings, and webinars. The Video Notebook browser extension and Zoom app enable users to take timestamped screenshots and notes while watching videos (on YouTube, Udemy, Coursera, and Vimeo) or attending meetings and webinars (on Zoom and Google Meet). Video Notebook’s web app then allows users to organize and revise their notes from all video and meeting platforms, as well share them with their colleagues or friends. The company’s apps use a computer vision technology which automatically recognizes slides in videos and meetings, and adds them to the list of notes. The company also uses large language models to generate text notes for videos and meetings. Video Notebook is the sixth Silicon Valley software company started by Mike Lanza. He sold two of his previous companies for successful exits, including Click.TV, a video annotation company he sold to Cisco Systems in 2007.

Sub Capitals GmbH Logo
Sub Capitals GmbH
1-10
2021
Sub Capitals is a BaFin-registered AI FinTech startup from Munich and the first technology provider to enable investors to invest with advanced artificial intelligence (AI). Based on the principle of embedded finance, they focus on the transformation of established markets and work together with a major investment bank to do so. They offer an AI as a Service platform where the first AI-based exchange-traded certificate is already available for anyone to invest from €100 . The platform allows customers to use AI in their investment process , and they are working closely with established financial institutions to enable AI as a Service . Until now, the benefits of AI technologies have been reserved exclusively for hedge funds and very large market participants. This is set to change with Sub Capitals, so that soon any asset manager, family office or retail investor will be able to upgrade their investment strategy to market neutrality with AI. Simple, better investing - with AI.

CoverEase, a digital insurance broker, has reinvented the way businesses shop, purchase and save on the insurance products they need most. CoverEase provides insurance options from over 17 different insurance companies, offering the consumer complete pricing transparency and insurance company choice in minutes vs. weeks. Business owners take a simple, 3-minute online journey to answer basic yet important questions about their business, and in 15 seconds, Lighting Max (CoverEase’s’ eager Golden Retriever mascot) delivers multiple quotes from multiple carriers using advanced AI, transforming a typical long and complicated process of buying insurance into a lighting fast, easy, and awesome experience. CoverEase combines its InsurTech with broker expertise to help businesses trust they are getting the most insurance coverage at the best price. CoverEase uses their advanced technology to offer an online “Amazon-like” shopping experience with unmatched choice for multiple insurance products, including no down payment workers’ compensation, business liability and property, cyber liability, employers’ liability, professional liability, term life insurance, group health, and dental and vision insurance with the best insurance brands in the country, including The Hartford, Travelers, Liberty Mutual, C N A, Markel, Berkshire Guard, Employers, AmTrust, CopperPoint, Cowbell Cyber, Great American, Ethos and Beam among others. In a separate 20-second interview, you can get multiple term life insurance quotes, an important coverage that is often overlooked, and if you like what you see, you will continue with your journey to answer a few health questions online to get same-day and affordable coverage without having a medical exam or blood tests. CoverEase works with non-insurance company partners to embed a digital plug-and-play insurance platform to its customers’ purchasing journey to help them save time and money. A national company, headquartered in California, founded by Shawn Marie Edgington in 2021 who serves as CEO. The CoverEase platform was built on the same technology that their sister company's pay-go agency E-COMP has been using and improving for over a decade and is powered by a team of commercial insurance veterans.

The security is already enhanced. Audio, video, and screen sharing, WebRTC libraries transmit real-time protocol packets (RTP) over user datagram protocol (UDP) via Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS), and media packets are encrypted using Secure Real-Time Protocol (see SRTP). Jan 2021
Recon Health is harnessing the power of Edge Computing and embedded Artificial Intelligence to provide world leading remote patient monitoring. From our offices in Vancouver, British Columbia and San Diego, California, the Recon Health team has developed a novel medical device, called the Virtual Care Patch, to provide clinical-grade, all-in-one multi-sensor continuous monitoring of critical vital signs to address the growing need doctors and nurses have for objective patient data during telehealth appointments and while providing other digital health services. The Virtual Care Patch will empower patients at home with medical-grade data and will provide essential analytics to aid in the clinical diagnosis and treatment of acute and chronic respiratory health conditions such as Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease, Sleep Apnea, COVID-19 and Long COVID. Puxano is a biotechnology company that specializes in accelerating structure-based protein research from sequence to structure. It integrates biotechnology, nanotechnology, and data sciences to offer a proprietary technology platform. This platform includes the development of innovative cryo-EM grids using a novel proprietary protocol, aiming to enhance the efficiency of protein structure determination. Puxano's interdisciplinary team, consisting of structural biologists, nanoengineers, and bioinformaticians, focuses on continuous innovation to support the needs of the research community. The company's technology platforms are designed to facilitate rapid screening and determination of protein structures, leveraging diffusion-based generative AI for experimental structural biology.

Be Biotechnologies Logo
Be Biotechnologies
1-10
2021
Be Biotechnologies is a biopharmaceutical, founded on cannabinoid and plant-based research, development, and Evidence-based drug development (EBD), aimed at transforming knowledge from biopharmaceutical sciences into new pharmaceutical drugs for animals and humans. For Evidence-based drug development (EBD), our R&D Team is working with several internal researchers and in collaboration around the world, using a decentralized development, using a Cloud Lab to development the Drug Candidates, increase experimental output, repeating the past work or deepen the analysis at the push of a button. A Board of Curators and Biomedical experts evaluates all the work, analysis of the new Drug Candidate using the advantage of Artificial Intelligence. Focus on intellectual contribution instead of manual labor. These Plant-Based Drug Candidates provide solutions to unmet medical needs in dermatology, anti-oxidant boosters for our astronauts, chronic pain, and various neurological diseases, providing patients access to more affordable and modern phyto-pharmaceutical treatments after regulatory clearance in each territory. Be Biotechnologies’ commercial platform has resulted in over 20 different formulations for the development of commercial products, including cosmetics, wellness, and pharmaceuticals, besides the global distribution of APIs/RAW materials. Be Biotechnologies want to become the hub for microgravity plant science in space, understanding the three-dimensional structure of proteins is critical to life science and biopharmaceutical researchers. This information can be used for understanding disease mechanisms, identifying drug targets, and optimizing pharmaceutical drug design. In Partnership with NASA and ESA Implementation Partners, Be Biotechnologies wants to create the opportunity to deepen our drug development knowledge. Be Biotechnologies powered by AI. #bionyc #biomadrid #wearebiotech #bebiotech Instagram @bebiotechnologies

MotiSure is working to create a more equitable insurance landscape that meets the needs of all people, regardless of their income or social status. MotiSure's tech-enabled and research-backed micro insurance solutions provide an essential safety net, with reduced premiums starting at $0.1 per day/trip. Easy product accessibility is ensured through embedding into existing social platforms and points of sale (POS) such as fuel stations and travel tickets making it easy to pay premiums and gain added benefits, even if customers do not have access to traditional banking methods. MotiSure has developed an API and conversational AI-powered omni-channel platform to enable customer onboarding, product sales and marketing, as an extension of existing embedded insurance services. Their platform, Sure+, is the technical interface between customer’s messaging apps and our corporate partners’ CRM/tech stack. The platform is designed to ensure that customers can easily access services including the personal accident cover products, and receive the support they need. For mobility clients, Sure+ has been modified to offer an end-to-end solution for booking commuter tickets, managing bookings and queries before and after purchase, embedding personal accident cover into the price of the travel ticket, and managing any claims in the event of an accident.

Sikanai Logo
Sikanai
1-10
2021
Sikanai is an edtech startup focusing on student-first solutions that benefit both the instructor and the student. We are two people who met in an online discussion forum focused on academic integrity. Our relationship grew sharing ideas about education using technology in novel ways. Our current focus is ghostwriting in the classroom, aka contract cheating. Plagiarism checkers don't detect ghostwriters or GPT. Research in academic integrity and contract cheating recommends that instructors read a student's submission and ask questions about their work. In an ideal world, instructors would have the time to be able to do this. Unfortunately, with pressing demands from administration, research, and life, many professors do not have the time to question students about their work - and that's why we created Auth+. Auth+ is a patent-pending ghostwriting deterrent on an AI engine. We take the first read for the instructor, question the student, and follow up with the student as needed. Auth+ detects students using an alternative author, regardless of intelligence.
E-Learning, EdTech, Education, Higher Education, Secondary Education
Covington, Kentucky, United States
Sikanai is an edtech startup focusing on student-first solutions that benefit both the instructor and the student.

Celeris Therapeutics Logo
Celeris Therapeutics
11-50
Jan 2021
Celeris Therapeutics is an AI-first drug discovery company that develops proximity-inducing compounds (PICs), focusing on PIC degraders for diseases with high unmet medical needs, such as Parkinson's and various types of cancers. Celeris Therapeutics has developed the Celeris One platform to streamline the development of degraders and, most importantly, rationalize their design. Celeris One leverages structure-based geometric deep learning to prioritize specific E3 ligases, design linkers, and select the most active compounds for synthesis. An in-house automated lab quickly generates experimental data for additional optimization cycles. Celeris Therapeutics collaborates with pharma and biotech companies to jointly discover and develop small-molecule degrader medicines for all therapeutic areas. It is also developing an in-house drug pipeline. Celeris Therapeutics has offices in Menlo Park, CA, and Graz, Austria.

Gandeeva Therapeutics Logo
Gandeeva Therapeutics
11-50
2021
Gandeeva Therapeutics is a precision biotechnology company integrating the power of cryogenic electron microscopy (cryo-EM) and machine learning to develop differentiated therapeutics by targeting and modulating key protein-protein interactions. Gandeeva’s structure-guided drug discovery platform encompasses target prediction and validation (SPOTLIGHT™), hit identification by screening virtual and fragment libraries (HYPERFOCUS™), and lead optimization (CRYO-CADD™). Gandeeva has a robust preclinical oncology pipeline targeting difficult-to-treat cancers with novel protein interaction modulators such as interfacial glues (iGlues™) and allosteric inhibitors. Gandeeva is headquartered in the Greater Vancouver area, Canada. Please visit www.gandeeva.com or follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter for more information.

Taelor Logo
Taelor
11-50
2021
Taelor is a Silicon Valley-based fashion industry start-up founded by Anya Cheng, ex Facebook and Target Lead who led teams to build Facebook Shopping and Target eCommerce and a current Northwestern University faculty member. Taelor is a revolutionary new way for men to rent clothes, allowing them to look and feel great every day while also reducing their carbon footprint. The service uses a combination of Artificial Intelligence and personal stylists to select clothes for men based on their sizes and personal preferences. The clothes are shipped directly to customers, who can either wear them for two weeks and return them or purchase the clothes for up to 70% off the regular retail price. Customers then receive another box of clothes. “Our goal is to provide individuals with stylish, everyday menswear. We believe that every day is an opportunity to look good and feel confident,” said Cheng, a former digital product lead at Facebook, eBay and Target. “And when you rent clothes instead of buying them, you not only save the time and energy of having to search and shop for clothes, but you also help the environment, too, instead of purchasing clothes that will eventually end up in a landfill.” Cheng has a strong background in both the digital and retail space. A TEDx Talk speaker and best-selling book author, Cheng spent 15 years leading digital innovation teams at Facebook, eBay, Target, McDonald’s and Sears before launching Taelor. Cheng said she originally got the idea to start a clothing rental subscription service for men after becoming a huge fan of other clothing rental subscription services herself. “I became such a fan of renting clothes that I haven’t purchased any clothes for myself except for underwear for the past five years,” Cheng says. “But I realized that none of the clothing rental services really served menswear nor focuses on helping people to achieve career or personal goals in their everyday life, and I thought, men should be able to enjoy this service too so they can feel ready and confident for their day.” The popularity of sustainability practices, minimalism, and no-ownership trends have caused the clothing rental business model to explode in recent years, with some analysts projecting that the Circular Fashion industry, which includes rental and resale, could earn as much as $66 billion by 2024 in the U.S. alone. Taelor gives customers the option to choose between two different subscription packages. The first option is a flat, monthly fee, where customers get two boxes per month, which include four shirts per box. The second option is for customers to pay a one-time fee, where customers receive three boxes in total, with four shirts per box. Both options include complimentary personalized styling, dry cleaning, and shipping both ways — making the process of renting and returning clothing easy and effortless. It’s a service that is a perfect solution for busy individuals who don’t want to spend time shopping or picking out their clothes. “I want to look good, but I don't really want to spend time shopping,” says Danny Ma, one of Taelor’s first customers. “I considered clothing subscription boxes for years, but I didn’t want to commit to buying something from each box. After using Taelor, I am much more confident!” For more information about Taelor, please visit https://taelor.style. For investment inquiries or schedule media interview, please contact hi@taelor.ai
E-Commerce, Fashion, Rental, Retail, Sharing Economy
San Francisco, California, United States
Taelor helps busy men look good without the commitment of buying clothes. AI-powered menswear rental subscription service in the U.S.

zypl.ai Logo
zypl.ai
11-50
2021
zypl.ai applies 'no data' AI at scale to advance financial inclusion in emerging and frontier markets. Our SaaS solution enables banks and microfinance organizations to instantly and accurate underwrite loans, both offline and digitally, to consumers with limited or no credit history. zypl's proprietary approach includes training AI models on synthetically generated data with simulation of 'black swan' conditions, providing stable and adaptable SaaS in spite of macro volatility in developing markets. Apart from analyzing traditional variables such as social, demographic, and professional background of clients, our SaaS reviews device metadata, psychometrics, web trace, and macroeconomic factors to arrive at credit decisions. In the process, we fully customize AI models to risk appetite of each individual enterprise partner with the goal of reflecting their competitive market advantages. Additionally, we offer complete flexibility on mode of integration through either cloud or on-premise deployment based on enterprise preference. We only deploy explainable AI models with embedded 'weight-of-evidence' interpretation of each decision made by the software, complying with emerging regulatory requirements on credit scoring. Having launched our beta last year, we have scaled presence to 10 enterprise clients in 4 markets across Central Asia. In this time, we have underwritten >$9 million in consumer and small business (services, trade, agriculture) loans to over 12 thousand consumers with staggeringly low 0.7% portfolio-at-risk rate. Since booking first revenue earlier this year, we have surpassed 25% compounded monthly growth rate and reached financial break-even this month. As a complement to credit scoring, our product team has ventured into churn prediction in telecom sector through partnerships with 3 leading telcos in Central Asia. Our rapid product iteration and development is a result of an AI Academy that we have launched to nurture talent internally. zypl.ai was ideated at Stanford University's Startup Garage and recently completed the Silkway Accelerator by Google for Startups and Astana Hub. Our startup was launched with a grant from the Islamic Development Bank as part of the Transform Fund. With our pre-seed capital raise, we plan on globalizing our AI SaaS solution by expanding to new markets in MENA, Southeast Asia, and Eastern Europe.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, SaaS
Dushanbe, Khatlon, Tajikistan

FINQ Logo
FINQ
11-50
2021
FINQ is an AI-powered investment platform. Using big data and cutting-edge science, FINQ analyzes the entire market continuously to offer objective and practical investing solutions. Our technology eliminates the biases and shortcomings of human intermediaries and allows everyone to invest with confidence and clarity. The core of our technology There are thousands of financial products to invest in, with tons of data stored in many places. FINQ's engine first collects every bit of data from every source possible, such as hundreds of analysts (professional wisdom), media and social media traffic and trends (crowd wisdom), and company-specific financial information (fundamentals). It then peels off the marketing wraps of complex products, breaks them down into their basic assets, and, accordingly, assesses their true value and risk. After pooling together all the data, it uses the power of AI to learn the patterns hidden in such a massive dataset. This way, we can gain scientific insights about different investing strategies and offer the best solutions suited for every risk level. And since using AI is a continuous learning process that only gets better with time, it allows FINQERS to always keep up to date with the market and respond promptly to changes.

Nuclearn is a software company delivering AI solutions for automating Nuclear Industry tasks. Nuclearn was established in 2020 by two esteemed veterans from the nuclear industry, Jerrold Vincent and Bradley Fox, driven by their passion for innovation. About Venvee: Venvee’s spatial AI provides an end-to-end understanding of customer journeys unlike anything the retail industry has seen before. Our CAPEX-free solution pioneers the latest advances in spatial deep learning, computer vision and digital twin construction to produce precise customer pathing and action insight using only a retailer’s existing infrastructural/loss prevention cameras. The result is a continuous, uninterrupted story about a customer’s complete in-store experience from entry to exit, inclusive of precise moment-to-moment location and impressions and interactions with product categories and advertisements. This rich, biometrics-free dataset is used by retailers and brands, in conjunction with POS and loyalty program data, to produce new revenue streams from in-store traffic by increasing the value of in-store media with standardized audience metrics and by precisely retargeting customers online based on in-store intent.

Palm Logo
Palm
11-50
2021
PALM is a cutting-edge company that leverages the power of AI and deep learning to provide enterprises with a comprehensive solution for talent management, development, and upskilling. We understand the evolving nature of work and the importance of growing a diverse global workforce. PALM empowers organizations to harness the full potential of HR data analytics and transform it into actionable insights in real-time, enabling a winning talent strategy. Our Offering: PALM offers a talent marketplace and collaborative platform that streamlines talent development, retention, and upskilling processes. With PALM, enterprises can effortlessly manage their workforce, identify emerging skills, and bridge the skills gap using AI-driven automation. Our solution enables teams to connect with the right profiles and foster collaboration at all levels, ensuring optimal performance and skill enhancement. Key Features: Skills Mapping: PALM's advanced AI algorithms automatically map skills, providing organizations with a comprehensive understanding of their talent pool. This enables them to identify skill gaps and make informed decisions for training and development initiatives. Real-time Skills Gap Visualization: PALM allows organizations to visualize the skills gap in real-time, providing actionable insights for strategic decision-making. By knowing which skills are lacking, companies can prioritize training efforts and allocate resources effectively. Personalized Reskilling and Upskilling Programs: In today's rapidly changing work environment, PALM enables organizations to deliver personalized reskilling and upskilling programs at a global scale. This ensures that employees stay relevant and equipped with the latest skills required for their roles. Data-driven Talent Insights: PALM leverages AI and deep learning to transform HR data into actionable insights. Organizations gain a comprehensive overview of their talent ecosystem, enabling them to make informed decisions about talent acquisition, development, and retention strategies. Connectivity and Collaboration: PALM facilitates seamless connections with various stakeholders in a company's ecosystem, including permanent, temporary, and part-time employees, former employees, and independent experts. This fosters collaboration, knowledge sharing, and the creation of a vibrant talent network. Advantages: Future-ready Talent Strategy: PALM equips organizations to adapt to the ongoing revolution of work. By addressing skills obsolescence, project-based work, and increasing competition for talent, PALM ensures that companies are well-prepared for the future of work. Global Scale and Real-time Insights: PALM enables organizations to operate at a global scale by providing real-time, actionable insights. This empowers companies to make agile decisions and respond swiftly to talent-related challenges and opportunities. Enhanced HR Data Analytics: PALM unlocks the full potential of HR data analytics by integrating AI and deep learning capabilities. This results in richer and more accurate talent insights, driving strategic decision-making and improving overall performance. Improved Employee Retention: PALM helps organizations understand their talent better and repurpose employees for suitable roles, reducing turnover rates. By offering personalized development opportunities and nurturing a collaborative work environment, PALM supports employee satisfaction and retention. PALM has successfully raised €2 million in a recent funding round, attracting investments from prominent investors and business angels. Key investors include Kima Ventures, STATION F, the 212 founders program by CDG Invest, and bpifrance, with participation from notable business angels. Recognized for its innovation and potential, Palm has been honored as a member of the Future 40, an esteemed group that recognizes the 40 most promising startups among the 1,000 hosted on the STATION F campus.
Apps, Human Resources, Management Consulting, Recruiting, Software
Paris, Ile-de-France, France
A comprehensive solution powered by AI and deep learning for talent management, upskilling, and data-driven HR insights.

Wavv, based in San Francisco, is a tech firm enhancing the landscape of the entertainment industry. With a focus on digital assets and open-source infrastructure, Wavv's platform is not just about music; it's about embracing the full spectrum of professional creative fields. At the heart of Wavv's innovation is Musica, the world's first large music language model. Developed using advanced AI, Musica is based on Western music theory and MIDI, designed to enhance and streamline the music creation process for professionals across various genres. Another standout feature of Wavv is Blackbox, an autonomous mixing protocol that revolutionizes post-production in the entertainment business. Blackbox utilizes AI to optimize audio and video editing workflows, significantly improving efficiency and output quality in post-production tasks. Guiding Wavv's path is founder Ivan Linn. Ivan's track record in the gaming industry, including leadership roles of joint ventures at Disney, Square Enix, and Ubisoft, has been pivotal in Wavv's strategic direction. His expertise and success in managing high-profile IP projects, which generated $35 million during his first year in tenure, bring invaluable insight and experience to Wavv's operations. Wavv caters to a broad spectrum of professionals through a multifaceted business model. This includes a tiered subscription system, specialized services for various entertainment sectors, and a community-driven marketplace. The platform's diverse revenue streams include subscriptions, value-added services, targeted advertising, and strategic partnerships. Wavv engages with different segments of the entertainment industry, leveraging San Francisco's vibrant tech and creative ecosystem for brand promotion and community engagement. Beam Dynamics Logo
Beam Dynamics
11-50
2021
Imagine: a teleprompter stops working midway through a live program. A lighting grid suddenly turns off during taping, and a pair of premium cinema cameras stop functioning on a film set. In 90% of cases, interruptions on set can be traced back to high-end production equipment failure. And downtime in our industry costs money – adding up fast to break budgets and even end careers. While common business systems like ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) or CRM (Customer Relationship Management) have digitalized wide parts of businesses and AI has taken center stage in the media supply chain, the management of production technology assets is still quite analog and fragmented, requiring manual data entry and monitoring from the workforce. Beam Dynamics is helping film & broadcast productions manage, maintain, and grow their critical technology infrastructure. The Beam enterprise asset management platform provides engineers access to all critical security patches, firmware updates, documentation, and contact information from over 5,000 vendors and close to a million products in a single user interface. Simply by uploading an inventory list with the model # and manufacturer, engineers get access to a rich set of critical data to keep productions on-air, on time, and on-budget.

2021
Alocalo provides end consumers with a system that suggests nearby retailers to them when searching for a more popular online retailer. It develops a search algorithm that can recognize the product that is displayed when the user searches for it and propose, in less than a second, a replacement in a nearby store. In addition, the plug-in provides the user with information about the name, location, contact information, and distance to the nearby store. Alocalo's technology makes use of the first self-learning AI platform for merchants to achieve these features. With the support of this network, small retailers may avoid losing market share to well-established internet rivals, keeping city centers vibrant with neighborhood shops.
Retail Technology, Shopping, Software

The company is redefining exposure therapy through a virtual reality-based training tool with customizable virtual simulations of social interactions and continuous quantification of patients' progress, allowing for patient-centric and individual treatment, and for the therapist to supervise and adjust exercises carried out by the patient. The Cross Product Logo
The Cross Product
11-50
2021
TheCrossProduct is a deeptech company offering software solutions for automated processing of 3D LiDAR data from railway, highway, and industrial facilities. Our solutions make it possible to automate inspections, inventories, measurements, and other specific analyses using 3D point clouds. We help infrastructure managers improve asset management and maintenance. The combination of 3D LiDAR and AI enables large-scale, automated, fast, and precise data processing. With our industrial and academic expertise, TheCrossProduct provides cutting-edge software that helps network managers reduce costs, enhance network knowledge and security, and improve operation and maintenance. Our SaaS solutions target network managers, surveyors, and engineering companies. Products & Use cases : The processing of point clouds may be painful and time consuming. Our automated processing solutions ease three processing steps: classification, vectorization and professional applications. Automated Point Cloud Classification A solution to recognize 3D objects in your infrastructure. With our software, each object gets assigned to a category in order to allow an extensive and accurate analysis. Automated Point Cloud Vectorization A solution to automatically generate 3D polylines of rails, lanes or cables. Professional Applications -Railway: Clash Detection, Gauge Simulation, Collision Report, Cross Section, Measurement -Highway : Reverse Engineering Report, Horizontal and Vertical Alignments, Cross Section, Measurements -Industrial Site: Automated 3D Modeling of Pipeline Facility, Cable Modelling, Automated 3D Modeling of Electrical Substation https://www.thecrossproduct.com/

Worddio: Vocabualry builder Logo
Worddio: Vocabualry builder
11-50
2021
Worddio is an AI-driven vocabulary-building app. We are growing our user base at a rapid pace because we offer our customers: - The unique feature to learn words without touching their smartphone. - 34 languages that cover 90% of the world's population. Our in-house AI/ML models help us in: - Building individual learning paths. - Optimizing marketing costs. - Deep user database segmentation (psychological, behavioral, and interests based) Customer Problem The main problem we face is the language barrier between peoples. This specifically applies to EU as a multi-lingual community. From other hand the biggest challenge for learning a foreign language is time. Advanced online technologies provide many learning opportunities but all of them require 100% focus for a long period of time which many people do not have. Products & Services To solve this problem, we turned the flashcards that students often use to memorize words into audio flashcards. Over 2000 people say that Worddio is a great tool for learning new words. With Worddio you can learn new words on the move or while doing something else, without touching your phone. Through this method, the learner will also memorize the pronunciation in the correct way, spoken by a native language speaker. We safe students time! Target Market The Worddio app is designed specifically for people learning a foreign language and who don't have time to learn and memorize new words. The Global Online Language Learning Market was valued at $12.49 billion in 2019 and is projected to reach $25.73 billion by 2027. With its 34 languages Worddio has potential usefulness for over 90% of the world population. Does it work? We have more than 200K installations and more than 1300 paying users. Business Model - subscriptions: 1, 3, 6 and 12 months, lifetime - up-sales of premium content - advanced flashcards by topics, Audiobooks and Podcasts. - Ads - general or targeted based on user profiles - Apply data & technology to other platforms/apps/fields . . . Developing a B2C model on a global level takes time and resources to break even, but once that happens, the return on investment is maximized at scale. Customer Segments Professionals: adults looking to improve their foreign-language skills for business or career reasons Casual learners: travelers, expats, or other persons wishing to learn a new language or enhance their current knowledge Sector-specific: Service workers, such as call-center staff or healthcare workers, who can perform better with a larger vocabulary and accurate pronunciation. Youth: 12-20 year-olds studying secondary languages in schools Sales & Marketing Strategy We have technology that allows us to build psychological profiles and predict users' behaviours without accessing their sensitive data. We can build bespoke learning paths, custom sales funnels, and target ads. The data gathered allow the pursue of three main objectives: optimzing marketing resources by leveraging predictive machine learning models creating individual learning paths based on users needs upsale of particular content or products Competitors The language learning apps space looks crowded but in fact there is a specific empty niche - passive learning. There are a lot of language learning apps on the market, but none of them use a passive learning method to save time for their users - Worddio is the only one that does. We are opening a new market group to support language learning. The Worddio app is a pseudo-passive learning app powered by AI which saves student time. Competitive Advantage Worddio main advantages are: - our app’s passive learning method - huge stock of professionally recorded audio-flashcards in 34 languages. - scientific-based approach that leverages ML and AI to optimize costs and improve user experience - premium content section - AI features that will help us deliver the ultimate hands-free experience to our users.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), EdTech, Education, Language Learning, Machine Learning
Middletown, Delaware, United States
The only one completely passive AI-driven vocabulary-building app. We solve the biggest pain - the lack of time.
138,428
19709

2021
Linkall provides Vanus AI and Vanus Connect, middleware solutions for LLM (large language model) App development. Its low-code environment streamlines the application of LLMs in enterprises use cases, speeding up delivery. Vanus AI offers a platform to enhance LLM apps with prompt engineering, vector database configurations and system integrations. Enterprise can embed their AI apps through website widgets or use the out-of-box integration to deploy bots in Discord, WhatsApp or other platforms. Vanus Connect is a serverless, event streaming system with processing capabilities that can embed LLM apps in any data pipeline or workflow. Enterprises can build pipeline that combine ChatGPT with WhatsApp or ingest Shopify event messages to vector database as the knowledge for large language models. Fitted Logo
Fitted
11-50
2021
Fitted is a fashion technology platform offering measurement, order management, and fulfillment of custom clothing to tailors and customers. Almost 4 billion on earth have custom clothing as a primary means of getting apparel - and in many emerging market economies like India, Nigeria, Pakistan etc. custom wear can account for up to 50% of people's wardrobes. Despite being so commonplace, customers often encounter ill fitting clothing and late deliveries, while suppliers have challenges managing orders, growing sales and managing working capital. This is a $125b+ market that is supremely underserved with no platform of collaboration at scale. The Fitted platform helps users manage the custom clothing experience seamlessly by offering order management and solving all critical pain points for all members of the value chain, spanning fashion buyers, tailors, and fabric sellers. Users can auto-generate reliable measurements and track orders, while suppliers can manage inventory and accept payments globally.

Officinae Bio Logo
Officinae Bio
11-50
2021
Officinae Bio’s mission is to become the leading platform for building with biology. Our platform integrates purpose-built experimental protocols, proprietary datasets and advanced design algorithms to accelerate product design and development, from personalized cell therapies to precision fermentation. Officinae Bio comes from the Latin word officinae meaning “the shop where things are designed and manufactured”. Our name reflects our mission to become the leading platform for biology design and build. What are we building? We’re working to overcome the greatest challenges to a future built with biology; starting with the DNA at the core of all biological engineering. Vulcanus - automated pipelines for long and complex DNA constructs Vulcanus is the first AI-driven pipeline to automate the entire process of building large and complex DNA; from oligo design to fragment assembly. Vulcanus is capable of designing optimal protocols for the build of long and complex DNA constructs up to 50kbp at a 93% success rate - nearly double the success rate of industry standard in time frames that make possible rapid development and screening cycles. Named after the latin god of the forge. Vulcanus was believed to have built the most sophisticated items of ancient lore, including Jupiter’s lightning bolts and Mercury’s winged helm. Ulysses - navigate biological complexity to design superior products Having mastered DNA build, we are developing solutions to the next bottleneck to building with Biology: design. Our Ulysses algorithm is enabling the smart navigation of complex option spaces when designing biological systems such as cell lines and strains. Ulysses leverages approaches for the design of the whole system rather than engineering individual parts. By recognizing the interconnectivity of all parameters and their nonlinear interactions of the system it allows for more robust, scaleable biological production and designs. Ulysses was the legendary Greek hero and king of Ithaca. His most famous journey was his ten-year struggle to return home through challenges and obstacles but he cleverly navigated through them with his wit and intellect. Next generation, scalable production systems With the foundations of DNA and design mastered, we are turning our unique approach to complexity, computation, automation and molecular biology to build the next generation of biological production systems. Our unique approach aims to overcome the challenges to scalability, predictability and purity of microbial production systems.
Biotechnology
Venice, Veneto, Italy
Biological design and manufacturing platform, from DNA synthesis to whole organisms.

We understand that your customers are your most valuable assets, and each one has unique needs, preferences, and buying behavior. To create a superior customer engagement platform, we surveyed numerous customers served by organizations in different parts of the world. We applied the Customer Satisfaction Index model across various enterprises to analyze customer satisfaction and loyalty. The results show that perceived quality had the most significant influence on customer satisfaction for satisfied and dissatisfied customers. Dialogview helps a myriad of enterprises, including financial institutions, to serve clients by integrating omnichannel capabilities and virtual agents with customer relationship management solutions. XPAI Logo
XPAI
11-50
2021
XPAI is a technology company that specializes in measuring the success of offline experiences. It was founded with the intention to solve the biggest problem of offline marketing by making these experiences measurable and a preferred choice in the marketing mix. XPAI utilizes advanced AI technology to analyze every visitor at every second, thereby measuring the experiences of the audience as precisely as online channels. The company's solution comprises three components: the AVAI ONE Sensor, the XPAI AI, and the Heartbeat data analytics platform. The AVAI ONE Sensor captures the physical world by automatically measuring millions of data points per second. The XPAI AI processes this data in the categories of demographics, perception, and engagement. The Heartbeat data analytics platform provides real-time insights in a convenient dashboard, which serves as the source for further reports. The company was started as a project under the name "Predictable Experience" in 2021 and has grown to become an independent enterprise. XPAI has a team of experts from various fields, including machine learning, marketing, software development, and hardware design. XPAI is also GDPR compliant and has been awarded the ePrivacyseal for its adherence to data protection and data security standards.

RoadViewer Logo
RoadViewer
11-50
2021
RoadViewer is a Road Corridor assessment and safety inspection tool, built by Anditi an advanced Australian spatial analytics and tech company specialising in the transformation, classification, analysis and visualisation of geospatial data, including aerial, mobile, terrestrial LiDAR, 360-degree aerial and satellite imagery. RoadViewer by Anditi offers an innovative and cost-effective way of surveying, managing and measuring roads, assessing road safety, extracting road assets, modelling safe journeys for oversized vehicles, and determining bridge clearances. With access to millions of kilometres of road data through our data capture partners, RoadViewer provides significant cost savings by reducing the requirement to manually survey roads. This also reduces risk exposure to personnel and the need for road closures. RoadViewer’s visualisation and measurement tools enable users to identify, code and inspect a broad range of road asset and safety attributes such as lane and shoulder widths, slopes, location of trees, safety barriers, power poles, as well as calculating key road geometry such as gradient and curvature quickly and accurately.
Analytics, Architecture, Big Data, Geospatial, Infrastructure, Logistics, Mapping Services, Software

ERA Logo
ERA
11-50
2021
ERA, also known as Existential Risk Alliance, operates in the fields of artificial intelligence, market research, non-profit, and risk management. The organization focuses on Global Catastrophic Biological Risks (GCBRs), which are biological risks of unprecedented scale that could cause significant damage to humanity. ERA offers an eight-week paid program, the ERA Cambridge Fellowship, which supports aspiring researchers in safeguarding the future of humanity. The fellowship provides researchers with an in-person, paid opportunity to study and mitigate these risks. As the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI) grows, ERA explores plausible pathways for outsourcing mental labor.

Konfer Logo
Konfer
11-50
2021
Konfer specializes in AI Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC) solutions, focusing on facilitating confident AI adoption within enterprises. The company's flagship product, Konfer Confidence™, is a real-time assessment tool that evaluates and reports on the compliance of systems against various regulatory frameworks. Built on the NIST Responsible AI Framework, Konfer's offerings enable GRC teams to structure governance processes around 10 pre-defined factors, allowing for a topic-based approach to GRC. This approach helps customize governance processes to meet specific needs. Konfer's AI GRC product is designed to map, measure, and manage AI assets in compliance with standards such as NIST AI RMF and EU AI, ensuring that enterprises can operationalize trust through transparency, fairness, robustness, security, and performance in their AI applications.

Paradigm
101-250
2021
Paradigm is rebuilding the clinical research ecosystem by developing a platform that allows all patients equitable access to trials while improving trial efficiency and lowering barriers to participation for healthcare providers. It is an innovative company that is dedicated to transforming the clinical research ecosystem. Their mission is to create a more accessible and equitable healthcare system by developing a platform that enables patients from diverse backgrounds to participate in clinical trials. Clinical trials are essential for testing and developing new drugs, therapies, and medical devices, but historically, they have been plagued by inefficiencies, barriers to access, and inequities in patient representation. Paradigm aims to solve these challenges by creating a platform that uses technology and data-driven insights to streamline the clinical trial process, making it more efficient, cost-effective, and inclusive. The Paradigm platform is designed to facilitate seamless communication and collaboration among all stakeholders involved in clinical research, including patients, healthcare providers, pharmaceutical companies, and regulatory agencies. By leveraging technology such as AI, machine learning, and predictive analytics, Paradigm can identify and match eligible patients to clinical trials, streamline the recruitment and enrollment process, and provide real-time data insights to all stakeholders. Overall, Paradigm's innovative approach to clinical research has the potential to revolutionize the healthcare industry by improving patient outcomes, reducing healthcare costs, and accelerating the development of new treatments and therapies.

Blink is a security workflow automation platform designed to make building, collaborating, and scaling all things security & beyond quick and easy using generative AI. Whether you prefer code, low-code, or no-code, Blink has got you covered. Easily drag and drop the actions you want into a workflow, leveraging the over 30,000 actions available in the automation library, or use Blink Copilot™ to generate a workflow with a natural language prompt. Use Blink as an automation hub, where security teams go to quickly develop, collaborate, and automate their security ideas. mediorbis Logo
mediorbis
51-100
2021
Initially founded as an online platform for doctors, mediorbis GmbH has developed into a high-tech online publisher for medical topics and apps. The core of the business model is to generate users through its own content via www.mediorbis.de and then monetize them through self-developed apps, relevant affiliate marketing and target group-specific online advertising. As the next leading data-driven publisher of freely accessible medical content, IT and AI applications in Germany, mediorbis is now aiming to massively expand its own content and roll out its portfolio of products and services internationally. As a fast-growing company, mediorbis GmbH is constantly developing new SEO-optimized content with 50 editors from 7 European countries. Currently, mediorbis GmbH has about 116 SEO-optimized guides with about 824,340 words in 10 medical topics. In the future, it is planned to cover up to 50 medical subject areas with approx. 2,500 digital guides. Year-on-year from June 22 to June 23, the number of monthly visitors increased by 482%, while the company's revenue doubled. In terms of content strategy and placement, mediorbis GmbH follows a steadily growing evergreen approach. In addition to medical guides, the company also produces content for LinkedIn, Youtube and other social media channels. mediorbis GmbH currently generates sales with: - IT services for physicians and pharmacists - Applications for patients, doctors and/or pharmacists - Marketing of products on own websites via affiliates deals - Marketing of advertising space on own websites Another business area of mediorbis GmbH that is not yet included in the business plan is artificial intelligence: frag.mediorbis.de is the first AI on the German market that is trained with comprehensive health information as well as all medical treatment guidelines. This allows mediorbis to respond to your questions individually and provide them with individualized answers. In order to be able to leverage the high potential of the company as efficiently and, above all, quickly as possible, the shareholders of mediorbis GmbH have decided to carry out a crowdfunding initiative. As an important step on the way to becoming the largest health portal in Europe, this initiative raises capital in particular for the expansion of the health guides, as well as their internationalization and accelerates the company's growth.

Hardware-free scalable and sustainable AI. We are democratizing Artificial Intelligence through software innovations. UNIQUE APPROACH. ThirdAI accelerator builds hash-based processing algorithms for training and inference with neural networks. The technology is a result of 10 years of innovation in finding efficient (beyond tensor) mathematics for deep learning. Our algorithmic innovation has demonstrated how we can make Commodity x86 CPUs 15x or faster than most potent NVIDIA GPUs for training large neural networks. The demonstration has shaken the common knowledge prevailing in the AI community that specialized processors like GPUs are significantly superior to CPUs for training neural networks. Several media outlets echo our technological superiority: IEEE Spectrum describes, "What they report is stunning." Investorplace considers the algorithm one of the biggest threats to NVIDIA Stock (a $500 billion company). Engadget calls it a "Completely different approach to Deep Learning". A quote from WCCFTech says, "If an implementation of this algorithm is mainstreamed it would almost instantly disrupt the dynamics of the deep learning ecosystem. Valuations of companies could change overnight." Kanop’s mission is to empower organizations to meet the standards of the Voluntary Carbon Market (VCM), make nature and climate-related disclosures in accordance with CSR frameworks, including ESRS, TNFD, and comply with the EU’s regulation for deforestation-free products (EUDR). Leveraging cutting-edge satellite imagery and advanced AI, Kanop delivers a comprehensive solution that provides accurate, scientifically validated, and fully auditable climate and biodiversity data. Our unique approach enables measurement for each specific site or project, thus giving organizations the means to make informed decisions and effectively meet regulatory requirements. Applications of Kanop’s technology include conducting detailed due diligence on nature-based carbon projects and monitoring ongoing initiatives, reporting on land use change (LUC) emissions and verifying adherence to EUDR standards.

CodiPlay Logo
CodiPlay
11-50
Mar 1, 2021
CodiPlay is a practice-oriented educational complex solution for teaching schoolchildren programming through mobile games and IoT constructors. It is designed for mastering the basic principles of coding using only a smartphone. Fascinating games help students understand the basics of algorithms, sequences, loops and conditional expressions, as well as develops algorithmic thinking and pattern recognition. In the mobile application a student can visually assemble an IoT constructor using block code elements, connect circuits and simulate the work of algorithms, then assemble the constructor in real life, upload his code to the Arduino uno controller from a smartphone and create different IoT gadgets. The CodiPlay curriculum has been designed based on STEAM and Maker Education, it consists of different levels of complexity, which is suitable for children from 6 to 17 years old. The project is a complex product of CodiPlay mobile application, CodiTeach educational web platform and CodiKit gadget creation kits implemented by means of business model of licensing - business model of software sale and use, when the supplier develops a web application and manages it independently, giving the customer access to the software via the Internet. Product Description: - CodiPlay mobile application for iOS and Android operating systems; - CodiTeach educational web platform for teachers; - CodiKit IoT kits.

11-50
Feb 1, 2021
Receptor.AI is committed to pushing the boundaries of precision medicine by developing a pipeline of novel small molecules that possess ultimate selectivity in targeting highly similar disease-related proteins such as homologs, mutants, isoforms, and allele variations. Our proprietary five-level selectivity assessment engine is designed to laser-focus on protein variants specific to particular human populations, organs, tissues and tumour types, ensuring precise alignment with patient profiles. Receptor.AI platform combines experimental structure determination techniques and AI-augmented medicinal chemistry, unlocking allosteric and cryptic binding pockets and unravelling protein conformational flexibility, making it possible to discriminate between otherwise indistinguishable targets and off-targets.

1-10
Apr 2021
Organizations generate vast amounts of textual data from diverse sources—ranging from legal contracts and technical manuals to customer interactions. The complexity escalates when considering the broader market-generated data. At Knowledgator, we simplify this challenge by offering end-to-end information extraction solutions to manage and expand users' knowledge assets. The system is equipped with zero-shot Named Entity Recognition, Entity Linking, Relation Extraction, multi-label Text Classification with probability scoring, and, importantly, tabular information extraction technologies that together cover 100% of any information extraction pipeline. Our models are based on a combination of statistical and symbolic approaches that allow us to achieve good generalization while bringing explainability and control to the outputs that are so hard to ensure using popular Generative AI approaches. It’s especially important for industries such as pharma, biotech or healthcare. Users can use default model APIʼs with +85% precision or efficiently fine-tune them to achieve 95% and integrate our NLP solutions into their data pipelines. These APIs seamlessly integrate into your existing data pipelines, filling any gaps in your workflow. Your conversations and case details are confidential and encrypted. - Diverse Legal Specialties: Our AI understands a broad range of legal areas - from injury and immigration to business law and intellectual property. - Connect with Real Lawyers (coming soon!): Need more than advice? FEATURES: - Interactive Chat: Discuss your legal concerns through a user-friendly chat interface. - Case Summarization: Vikk AI summarizes your case details for your record or to share with lawyers for a consultation. - Lawyer Marketplace (coming soon): With your consent, access a network of legal professionals ready to assist you. - Document Analysis (coming soon): Upload documents for Vikk AI to review and provide initial guidance. Constant Learning: Our AI continuously evolves, learning from interactions to provide more accurate and relevant advice. SECURE,SMART AND READY TO ASSIST Our technology is enabled by cutting-edge AI, leveraging our proprietary data, and systems to offer unparalleled legal support. Join thousands of users who are navigating the legal landscape more confidently with Vikk AI. DOWNLOAD VIKK AI FOR FREE Start your legal journey with Vikk AI today – your first step towards hassle-free legal clarity. WE'RE HERE FOR YOU Our mission is to make legal help accessible for everyone. If you're facing legal uncertainty or simply need quick advice, talk to Vikk. We're here to change the way you think about legal support. CONNECT WITH US We're constantly working to improve your experience with Vikk AI. If you have any feedback or questions, please reach out to us at hello@vikk.ai HERE ARE A FEW FAQ’s: WHAT IS VIKK AI? Vikk is an on demand generative AI legal assistant where you can discuss your case detail in human like interactions. IS VIKK A LAWYER? No ! Vikk is not lawyer nor a law firm. Vikk does not give legal advice but gives you legal assistance. Is VIKK FREE TO USE? Yes! Vikk is free to use for you the consumer. There are daily account and platform limits that may interrupt a chat. WHAT STATES DOES VIKK COVER? Vikk will answer questions covering the entire 50 United States and will tailor its answer based on the jurisdiction you are in. Vikk will also answer federal case subjects like IP and Bankruptcy. CAN I TALK TO VIKK IN OTHER LANGUAGES? Not yet ! While Vikk is able to understand other languages our first release is in English. We will roll out other languages in future releases. IS VIKK AVAILABLE FOR OTHER COUNTRIES BESIDES USA? Not yet. Vikk is currently trained on laws of the United States of America only. TALK TO VIKK NOW ! Download Vikk AI and step into a world where legal help is always in your pocket. Developer: Law Zebras Inc. Vikk AI harnesses the power of AI to deliver immediate legal assistance and guide you through "what if's" or urgent help in any legal categories in all 50 states.

openpbl.ai Logo
openpbl.ai
11-50
Mar 26, 2021
OpenPBL uses artificial intelligence to reduce the costs of businesses and schools with the active development of behavioral skills. ... Companies are increasingly demanding from their employees the development of professional behavioral skills that will allow them not only to achieve the expected results but to achieve them in the most efficient way possible. Problem-Based Learning, or simply PBL, is a proven effective learning strategy for developing these kinds of professional behavioral skills. However, the courses of schools that traditionally apply the full PBL process, such as Harvard, Minerva School, and École 42 are expensive and not accessible to most professionals. The OpenPBL's mission is to democratize the "problem-based professional education", allowing access to learning experiences based on typical career problems. ... The company is currently promoting a fundraising roadshow. More details on https://bit.ly/OpenPBL-Business-Pitch.

b|ver Logo
b|ver
1-10
Apr 2021
speechx provides desktop and mobile apps that analyse a user's voice, during online meetings or rehearsal sessions, and provides AI-generated recommendations that improve critical speaking parameters like clarity, brevity, inclusivity and confidence. During a live work meeting, speechx provides real-time insights into pace, volume, contribution and fillers; helping users correct their speaking style on the fly. Post-meeting, speechx generates deeper insights by analysing the language used to determine how the user performed on critical speaking parameters. speechx works in conjunction with the 800+ commonly used communication tools; analyses user's voice discreetly and does not record or store conversations by default (there is a opt-in feature to do this though) speechx also provides a safe environment for users to rehearse important conversations and repeat till they are happy with their vocal delivery. speechx gamifies the user experience enabling users to set, measure and achieve their communication goals (read: Fitbit for Communication Training). speechx provides aggregated insights to managers & coaches in enterprise deployments. To summarize; if (Grammarly : Writing) then (speechx : Speaking)

Nexis Network
11-50
Jan 7, 2021
A public layer-1 blockchain foundation for the decentralization of an Artificial Intelligence ecosystem providing distributed computing and decentralized data storage. Combining the strengths of optimistic and ZK proofs, Rust and Solidity programming languages, Nexis aims to enhance scalability, minimize cost barriers, and enable, and provide secure and adaptable transactions for lightning-fast data availability for the future of accelerated computing, RWA’s, DeFi and Artificial Intelligence (AI) models. Nexis Network offers an innovative solution addressing critical issues in the blockchain and Web3 space that limit utilization by Artificial Intelligence (A.I.), Risk-Weighted Assets (RWAs) and financial markets. Nexis Network enhances cross-chain interoperability, instant transaction settlement, enhanced data security, and scalable low-cost transactions. A crucial element of Nexis’s design is its Decentralized Delegated Proof-of-Stake Validator Network, which ensures real-time, interoperable and affordable transactions forever, challenging the maximal extractable value (MEV) dominance and eradicating central points of control. The project's modular framework allows each ecosystem component to evolve independently, keeping pace with rapid innovations in accelerated computing, artificial intelligence, and consumer applications.

Prevasio Logo
Prevasio
1-10
Mar 13, 2021
Prevasio is a next-generation Cloud Security Posture Management with a built-in vulnerability and anti-malware scan for docker containers. The mission of Prevasio is to combine in one affordable solution the lightness and convenience of a classic CSPM with the attack prevention capabilities of a CWPP. Prevasio achieves that by combining 3products in one solution. 1. Cloud Security Posture Management Prevasio requires only a few minutes to complete a full scan of all your assets. The scan will reveal any misconfiguration issues in the cloud platform according to best practices and compliance standards. 2. Vulnerability Assessment and Anti-malware If you have any public or private containers, Prevasio will also perform a full vulnerability assessment of all packages and libraries found to be installed in those containers. Prevasio will perform an anti-malware scan of all files found to be present in any discovered public or private containers. Main features: - Prevasio creates no agents and runs no code in your cloud - It uses no servers, thus having a very low cost per scan - Being serverless, it scales up quickly to process any load - It starts an analysis in milliseconds and finishes in minutes It only takes a few mouse clicks to connect Prevasio to your Cloud account. Once connected, it will scan your assets within minutes, revealing any misconfigurations, vulnerabilities, or malware. 3. Secret Sauce - As a portfolio company of SRI, Prevasio is also leveraging proprietary SRI AI intellectual property to empower Virtual Private Assistant (VPA) technology to assess and detect cybersecurity threats using unsupervised machine learning.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Cloud Security, Cyber Security, Penetration Testing
Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
Prevasio is a next-generation Cloud Security Posture Management with a built-in vulnerability and anti-malware scan for docker containers.

Yes Collective Logo
Yes Collective
1-10
Feb 4, 2021
Fifty-one percent of mothers report feeling depressed and 42% report crying due to overwhelm at least a few times a week. Between 2008 and 2018 there was a 30% increase in parent-reported stress, while today 62% of parents find at least some aspects of parenting “extremely stressful.” We're in the midst of a parent mental health crisis. Modern parenting is H-A-R-D, and we’re here for it. Yes Collective is transforming mental healthcare for parents with the first-of-its-kind digital mental wellness platform that solves the interconnected problems of modern family life through coach-led guidance, step-by-step practice, and community support. Our collective is an expert team of doctors, therapists, psychologists, and behavioral health coaches who translate cutting-edge science and expert wisdom on all facets of parent mental health & wellness into actionable, simple, and effective tools for self-healing and multi-generational wellbeing. We combine parent-focused expert knowledge and practice into a mobile ecosystem of AI-assisted emotional fitness coaching, live therapist-led events, daily articles and recordings from the experts, and a private, facilitated social network just for parents. Yes Collective is stepping up to transform mental and emotional healthcare for all parents by making expert therapeutic tools, practices, and one-on-one support accessible, bringing expert care right into their back pockets. We’re helping families become happier and healthier, one parent at a time.

BuzzChat Logo
BuzzChat
1-10
Mar 6, 2021
Buzz Chat Inc. (stylized as BuzzChat) is an African social media app that was released in 2021, and developed by Frederick Abila. Alongside advanced features for sharing digital content, as well as the ability to accommodate small e-commerce stores, it is specifically known for hosting a selection of AI assistants that encourage users to talk about their mental health, business ideas, and career ambitions. Critics noted its emphasis on bringing a new social networking wave across Africa, with a seemingly similar global strategy to Elon Musk's X. The name "Buzz" comes from the social alignment one associates with vibrating notifications, as well as two of the word's definitions: excitement and phone calls. According to the app's description on Google's Play Store, BuzzChat encourages its users to interact with a "digital ecosystem," emphasizing the brand's ambitions to become what's beginning to be known as an 'everything app'. Although it began with relative obscurity, it rapidly gained its first 5,000 users and continues to grow.
Machine Learning, Social Media, Software
Accra, Greater Accra, Ghana
