KlaDot is a Texas-based Software as a Service (SaaS) company that provides cloud-based accounting and business operations software for minority SMBs, accountants, bookkeepers, startups, gig workers, and freelancers to manage their finances and operations. It offers a variety of features and benefits, including: Invoicing: Invoice creation, templates, customer management, payment processing, payment reconciliation, manual payment recording, and overdue invoice tracking. Secure contract: Contract creation, escrow payment, work submission and verification, payment release, dispute resolution, security and privacy, notifications and communication, record keeping, and user profiles. Inventory management: Inventory tracking, cost assignment, bill scanning, inventory valuation, low stock alerts, and reporting. Bookkeeping/accounting: Income tracking, expense tracking, sales invoicing, and payments, purchases and bill payments, bank reconciliation, financial reporting, tax preparation, chart of accounts, double-entry accounting, and cash book view. Budgeting - financial performance: Budget creation, cost estimation and tracking, revenue forecasting, financial reporting, performance analysis and monitoring, and categorization. Simple HR: Employee directory, self-service KYC and bank account setup, payroll integration, payroll authorization, banking integration, and reporting. Projects management: Project details, employee assignment, resource allocation, cost tracking, budgeting and targets, invoice generation, payment recognition and reconciliation, and project overview. Payment Processing: Payment collections and disbursements, AI-powered payment analysis, AI-powered expense categorization, request payment, KYB (Know Your Business) checks, employee or individual accounts, employee or personal cards, and Know Your Customer process and other embedded finance services that support businesses and freelancers, etc. AI assistant: User query resolution, country-specific tax information, support escalation, command execution, contextual understanding, user training, personalized experience, and notification and alerts. KlaDot is a secure and reliable platform that can help businesses of all sizes streamline their finances and operations. It is a powerful tool to help you manage your business more efficiently and effectively. Users can use KlaDot through any of its subscription packages: A 30-day Free Trial, Lite, Plus, Premium, and Enterprise. The software solution is available on the web, iOS, and Android platforms. klaDot was founded in 2021; the minority startup is headquartered in Prosper, Texas, USA.

Geescore™ Logo
Geescore™
11-50
Mar 5, 2021
Geescore operates a jobseeker scoring service that helps hiring companies find high quality, suitable candidates. The service includes custom screening questions, and fraud detection to ensure the jobseeker’s resume is not fake or exaggerated. The service is available via API as well as with an embeddable javascript widget, for websites with job postings and career pages. Number 1 Problem in Hiring The number one problem in hiring is finding suitable, high scoring candidates. Geescore scores, matches and engages with jobseekers before they apply, and even if they don’t apply. You can try the jobseeker scoring service for yourself at https://myjobscore.com Proof of Awesomeness Every time a jobseeker is scored they are given a free downloadable PDF called “the proof of awesomeness” with all the information related to their score, ready to be sent in with a resume when applying for the job. The PDF is a handy resource perfect for hiring managers to review the jobseeker’s score, link to their LinkedIn profile, download the resume, and more. Validated No Bias Scoring Every day we test and verify that the Geescore scoring service is operating properly, and accurately scoring jobseekers without bias. We do not use data that could create bias in the scoring service, for example; ethnicity, religion, age, race, country of origin, post-hiring data and more. Easy to Use API and built-in dashboards Geescore operates in both the front-end and back-end. This means a hiring manager can access a built-in dashboard right inside a job posting to review the Scoring Metagraph, sort jobseeker scores, and more. They can also access the Scoring Metagraph via open API ready for integration to any platform to access data, analytics, scoring, custom scoring and fraud detection. The Bottom Line - how Geescore helps Recruiters and Hiring Managers The emergence of AI tools for jobseekers to fake or exaggerate a resume, and then to apply to hundreds of jobs automatically, is creating serious challenges for Recruiters and Hiring Managers. Today, with these AI tools, the number could be only 1 in a 1,000 applications, that come from qualified candidates. Seeing a validated score for a jobseeker, instantly gives Recruiters and Hiring Managers a great advantage. They can identify and direct their focus on to the best candidates, with “high touch” attention, in an effort to beat the competition; all trying to hire the best. Geescore reduces the cost and workload of Recruiters and Hiring Managers. AI is creating a lot more work for Recruiters and Hiring Managers - such as more reference checks, more interviews, longer probationary periods and signed undertakings from applicants. The Bottom Line - how Geescore helps Jobseekers Submitting an application doesn’t guarantee a job offer. In fact, hiring companies are adding defensive measures to combat AI based fake and exaggerated resumes, and auto apply tools. Why not just apply to a lot of jobs? A Jobseeker looking to advance through interviews, should focus on opportunities where they are a good fit. Where they get a high score. A jobseeker needs to have the experience and qualifications to get through interviews, and the hiring process. Knowing their score, helps the jobseeker identify their best opportunities, and then frees up the time to research the company and opportunity, to prepare for interviews, and to network with people who can support their job application.
Augmented Reality, Generative AI, Human Resources
Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Geescore™ & My Jobscore use AI to score and match Jobseekers in job posts, job search, career pages and brand fan sites.

Omma Data is the first data quality platform designed for business users (no code needed) that solve one big global challenge: CHECK THE QUALITY OF THE DATA THAT THE COMPANIES ARE USING TO MAKE STRATEGIC DECISIONS. Taugor Corporation Logo
Taugor Corporation
11-50
Feb 26, 2021
Transformando Empresas em Tempo Recorde, com Soluções Inovadoras de Transformação Digital A Taugor Corporation é líder em transformação digital para o mercado lusófono, atendendo empresas de micro a grande porte com uma abordagem centrada na eliminação do papel e na otimização da gestão de informações. Como uma franqueadora de tecnologia com 42 unidades no Brasil, a Taugor oferece soluções que vão além da simples digitalização de documentos. Nossa suíte de seis sistemas integrados possibilita uma transformação digital completa, com custo-benefício incomparável, adaptando-se perfeitamente às necessidades específicas de cada cliente. Visão e Missão: Nossa missão é tornar a Taugor Corporation a maior provedora de soluções de transformação digital nos países de língua portuguesa. Nós nos comprometemos a levar inovação contínua e eficiente para empresas de todos os portes, utilizando inteligência artificial e tecnologia de ponta para facilitar a tomada de decisões. Produtos e Serviços: A Taugor oferece: Digitalização de Documentos em Grande Volume: Reduza o uso de papel e transforme a gestão de documentos. Guarda de Documentos: Armazenamento seguro e eficiente para um acesso rápido e simplificado. Suíte de Soluções Integradas: Seis sistemas que cobrem desde a gestão eletrônica de documentos (GED) até o controle centralizado de processos. Diferenciais Competitivos: Soluções 100% Integradas: Nossas ferramentas trabalham em conjunto para garantir uma transformação digital completa, sem a necessidade de múltiplos fornecedores. Rapidez na Implementação: Implementação rápida e eficiente, garantindo que as empresas experimentem os benefícios da transformação digital em tempo recorde. Custo-Benefício Superior: Nossas soluções oferecem um excelente retorno sobre o investimento, diferenciando-se significativamente de outras opções no mercado. Mercado-Alvo: Atendemos empresas dos setores B2B e B2G que buscam eliminar o uso de papel e modernizar suas operações. Nosso público-alvo inclui qualquer organização que precise otimizar o controle de documentos e processos, garantindo acesso rápido e seguro à informação. Soluções e Benefícios: Redução do Uso de Papel: Facilite a gestão documental e promova práticas sustentáveis. Gestão de Informação em Tempo Real: Tenha informações organizadas e acessíveis em segundos. Controle Centralizado e Simplificado: Melhore a eficiência dos processos com uma plataforma unificada. Tecnologia de Ponta: Nosso Gestor Eletrônico de Documentos (GED), com tecnologia de inteligência artificial, está entre os melhores do mercado, permitindo automação avançada e uma gestão documental mais inteligente. Impacto e Casos de Sucesso: Com clientes de destaque como Ouro e Prata, Concebra, e Vivo, a Taugor tem impulsionado transformações digitais que melhoram a eficiência operacional e aumentam a agilidade na gestão de documentos e processos. Metas e Expansão: Com um crescimento médio de 40% ao ano, a Taugor busca dobrar seu crescimento em 2024, ampliando suas soluções e integrando inovações de IA para continuar a liderar a transformação digital. Visão de Longo Prazo: Nosso objetivo é expandir nossa suíte de soluções de 6 para 10, 20 ou até 30 sistemas, oferecendo sempre novas tecnologias para atender às necessidades de transformação digital das empresas. Reconhecimento e Parcerias: Nascida no polo de tecnologia Tecnosinos e acelerada pelo programa do Google, a Taugor está em constante evolução e busca consolidar-se como uma referência no mercado de transformação digital. Na Taugor Corporation, acreditamos que a transformação digital não é apenas uma tendência, mas uma necessidade para empresas modernas. Estamos prontos para guiar organizações de todos os tamanhos em sua jornada rumo a uma gestão de informações mais eficiente e inovadora.

The goal is to make it easier for the next billion users to access the Metaverse by using AI and blockchain. Babylon Voice brings together top brands, and users on the Web3 to build a decentralized network that promotes access to ownership, financial inclusion, and digital identity. It uses VoicePrint, NFTs as a secure and fact-checked web3 storage and transfer option for digital voice data that respects user privacy and is resistant to bots. Food is the backbone of human survival. What began as a survival instinct, food has evolved to embody our contemporary civilization in all its aspects. Food culture is ubiquitous and intertwined with our daily life with diversified food choices from around the world. This immense possibility of choices has given rise to a very basic problem of decision-making in our lives: “what should I eat today?”, a trademark dilemma of at least 1 out of 10 people in your life presumably. To resolve this daily challenge of decision making in choosing what to eat, we have developed Pikky, an AI driven personalized recommendation engine designed to simplify this process. Pikky’s engine not only simplifies the process of choosing what to eat but also maximizes satisfaction from your food choices. We pride ourselves in committing to assist you in every step of experiencing this unique food ecosystem. The journey begins with the most important step where we try to understand you and your food habits. Then with every use, Pikky analyzes every aspect of your food habit and exploratory food behavior and creates à la carte curated only for you. You have the flexibility to choose from our curated recommendations or explore by yourself to see what all the restaurants in your vicinity have to offer. After you have finally come to a decision, we reach the climax of the journey where we bring food to your doorstep so that you are optimally satisfied with your food choice and our recommendation.

Vammon Logo
Vammon
1-10
Mar 19, 2021
Vammon is a Saas platform designed for logistics optimization, using it you can manage your logistics flows In/Out collaborating with customers and suppliers who are companies or transporters. It is possible to manage price auctions, book loads, issue transport orders, confirm availability of material, manage travel documents, certificates, communications between the parties and traceability of the goods, but also manage transport problems, reservations of loading and unloading at the loading docks or on third-party platforms, and all WITHOUT making phone calls or writing emails. All this collected data provides detailed analysis on flows allow you to define the best routes, analyze times or quantities of material shipped to evaluate variations in work programs. It is finally possible to have certain data on the impact generated for Scope 3, in fact every transport is managed separately from the others and has, among other things, certain data on the vehicles used and the distances travelled, and therefore on the impact generated. We calculate that a company that moves 500 packages (in different shipments) can save up to 1500 hours of work in one year. The target customer is any company that produces, processes, reworks or markets products that needs to ship material on pallets or in large boxes that cannot be moved manually or without the use of transport equipment handling, or companies that need to manage arrivals and departures from their warehouses, or freight forwarders or couriers who handle large quantities of material. To date, Saas Vammon seems to be the only one that allows the management of shipments and dialogue between company/transporter/supplier at 360 degrees and without constraints, all other platforms are for use exclusive to the customers of individual transporters or forces customers to exchange messages and emails for negotiations.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Consulting, Logistics, Online Portals, Professional Services, Software
Milano, Lombardia, Italy

Leverage Robotics Logo
Leverage Robotics
1-10
Apr 1, 2021
Leverage Robotics is a spin-off of the German Aerospace Center (DLR), founded in April 2021 in Munich. We are developing a highly flexible and intelligent robot cell for fast setup and multi-task applications. For this purpose, we have developed a robot hardware toolbox with a generalized tool base that can be picked up by the robot and enables the realization of different tasks with the same robot, in particular logistics, assembly, quality or packaging of complex products. Each of these tools has corresponding pre-programmed software modules, i.e. robot skills, and additionally strategy skills for intuitive robot programming for non-experts. To ensure safety, access, and economical speeds when operating robots without a safety fence, we always inflate an airbag with compressed air before the robot moves and cover dangerous sharp-edged tools and workpieces. When the robot stops or moves slowly, we retract the airbag to maintain full tool functionality and workpiece handling.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Manufacturing, Robotics

TRAIVIS (TRAINING VISION) Logo
TRAIVIS (TRAINING VISION)
11-50
Feb 1, 2021
TRAIVIS is an educational UK-based company founded in February 2021. TRAIVIS is a short form of ‘Training’ and ‘Vision’, is an online educational business at the intersection of sector-leading pedagogies and cutting edge Blockchain, AI and gaming technologies. TRAIVIS is built on a professional team of academicians (Professors and Doctorate holders) and experts in E-learning, Blockchain and Artificial Intelligence(AI) Fields. During the Covid-19 pandemic, TRAIVIS’s team found many issues related to E-learning courses that affect the users. The challenges include institutional mistrust of online issued certificates, a poor level of online courses incompletion, poor knowledge of learners’ learning style, and students feeling isolated and detached from the E-learning process. In view of this, TRAIVIS has taken the initiative to tackle the existing challenges in the E-learning industry. TRAIVIS’s team and advisers have spent countless hours in primary and secondary research to reverse engineer these challenges and purpose effective solutions. TRAIVIS’s solutions model consists of three main areas: AI, Blockchain and Gaming. These areas cover eight solutions that include: Course recommender system (AI), Learning style recommender system (AI), Chatbot (AI), Grade prediction (AI), Metaverse (TRAIVERSE) Blockchain, Certificate verification Blockchain, TRAIVIS (TRVS) tokens, and E-sport tournaments (Learning War). This combination of unique solutions works as elements for the TRAIVIS ecosystem with UK patent application number GB2113851. TRAIVIS has secured a partnership with well-known universities in the UK and worldwide, such as the University of Sunderland, Sunderland College, Newcastle College, University of Vigo, University of Unicamp Brazil and University Raharja Indonesia. There are many collaborations in the pipeline.
3D Technology, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Education, Metaverse
Newcastle Upon Tyne, Newcastle upon Tyne, United Kingdom
Training Vision is an online educational business that will be built on Blockchain, AI and Gaming technologies.

ELNAV.AI Logo
ELNAV.AI
1-10
Apr 30, 2021
Company Goals •Implementation of automatic speech recognition and speech emotion recognition in the safety of navigation. •Introduction of beamforming microphones in the marine environment •Access to data from connected sensors and audio recordings of helm orders as additionalevidence in case of investigation as a supplement to data from existing VDR or S-VDRdevices – the practice has shown that in case of a maritime accident, audio recordingscollected from Voyage Data Recorders are often not of sufficient quality to be relevant tothe investigation, as stated in many publications. Why Now? From the technological perspective, speech recognition has a long history with several waves of major innovations. Most recently, the field has benefited from advances in deep learning and big data. The advances are evidenced not only by the surge of academic papers published in the field but, more importantly, by the worldwide industry adoption of a variety of deep learning methods in designing and deploying speech recognition systems. What problems are we solving for a specific customer? Helm Order Monitor is the first technological solution to the problem of insufficient monitoring of helm orders between helmsman and pilot or navigator onboard ships. Communication problems cause more than 40% of accidents at sea. Did you know that the disaster of Costa Concordia happened due to the helmsman applying the helm on the wrong side shortly before the impact? We are fixing this problem with an electronic device that combines automatic speech recognition and data from the ship's sensors. The device monitors, in accordance with maritime regulations and in conjunction with the ship’s sensor data, whether the issued helm orders are clear, confirmed, and correctly executed. Helm Order Monitor is like Lane Departure Warning to use an analogy with road transportation. Below are the main problems that Helm Order Monitor solves: •The most apparent problem is that nothing prevents a helmsman from putting therudder over the wrong way. The helmsman can also misinterpret or otherwise wrongly execute issued helm orders. •Most automated warnings are not available in hand steering, such as Default RoTdeviation warning, Drift limit alarm, Max. rudder alarm and Low-speed alarm. •Monitoring of helm orders requires a high level of concentration which reduces situational awareness. •Unsafe stress level is another significant contributor to navigational incidents. How do we reach our customers? We will attain sales through these programs: Marketing through partnerships, regulation entities, and social media, Marine Expos and Conferences, Nautical Simulator Demonstrations, and Ship Demonstrations. The ultimate goal for Helm Order Monitor is to achieve mandatory status on all merchant ships over 3000 GRT and all passenger ships regardless of their size.
Intelligent Systems, Marine Technology, Speech Recognition
Split, Splitsko-Dalmatinska, Croatia
ELNAV.AI develops systems with state-of-the-art technology to keep ships safe.
510,958
21000
elnav.ai
European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
—
View on LinkedIn
—
info@elnav.ai
—
(+385) 91 443 3348
—

SkyMakers
11-50
Apr 14, 2021
SkyMakers Digital pioneering innovation in software development. Our vision is to be at the forefront of technological advancements. We aim to redefine industry standards through cutting-edge solutions and a commitment to excellence. Our products include: Authgear: An open-source, auth-as-a-service (AuthaaS) solution designed for consumer-facing web and mobile applications. Authgear is developer-friendly, offering opinionated defaults to streamline the process. It empowers developers to enhance their applications' security by enabling features like two-factor authentication (2FA), session management, and passwordless login out-of-the-box. Additionally, Authgear simplifies integration, allowing businesses to unify the authentication experience across various platforms. FormX.ai: We leverage cutting-edge AI technologies to help businesses gain insights from documents. FormX.ai is an API that extracts structured data from documents or forms captured using mobile devices. Our diverse clientele includes shopping malls that utilise FormX.ai to extract product details from receipts for targeted customer offers and government agencies that expedite approval processes by automatically verifying names and addresses from bank statements.

IBF Net Group Logo
IBF Net Group
11-50
Apr 30, 2021
IBF Net is the maiden online community for exchange of views among researchers and professionals in the field of Islamic business and finance set up in the year 1999. In the same year, IBF Net designed and offered the maiden suite of certifications in Islamic finance in online mode. Twelve years later, IBF Net moved to Malaysia with the establishment of its flagship, the International Institute of Islamic Business and Finance with a mission to “leverage research and technology to build a halal ecosystem”. In 2020, it set up the IBF Digital Labs in Singapore to develop platforms on Algorand blockchain protocol and AI. 2021 witnessed the merger of all IBF Net social media networks into a parent Network under a new entity called IBF Net Limited based in Ireland. The Network now seeks to develop and host multiple platforms and use cases in line with the trichotomy of an Islamic economy into philanthropy, not-for-profit and for-profit segments. It aims to develop smart contracts using Algorand protocol that are replicable and customizable for various Islamic financial contracts. Together, they act as the engines for developing the Network as a replicable miniature Islamic economy on the blockchain.

TREES.app Logo
TREES.app
1-10
Apr 15, 2021
We've created a recommendation engine for life that helps individuals engage and thrive in large organizations. The TREES app provides the right student or employee with the right resource/plan at the right time. Users complete a psychometric/habit/demographic questionnaire using a novel "slider" (patent pending), then the app reorders staff- and user-generated plans into what is most likely to work for the user, based on ratings by similar users. These plans increasingly start with short-form videos as those are getting the best engagement. Initial trials of the app were for university students and oriented towards providing plans to indigenous students, youth with disabilities entering the workforce, and people afflicted by mental health issues. Now, eight new universities are set to come on board to provide our service to foster youth in the United States, Canada, and South Africa. Universities and colleges have been a great starting place. We are focused on growing in that market and refining our product. In the long run, however, the function of the app opens the possibility for questions and plans to be catered to just about any audience while using the same technology, allowing us to potentially help countless other groups. All it takes is questions and plans (which the AI helps improve over time) and a user base (at least 1,000 users) who want to achieve something. For university students that "something" is belonging and academic success. For other trials, we've had interest in rollouts for sales success, job success, mental health, addiction recovery, or being a great parent.

1-10
Apr 28, 2021
At WikiExpert we build global communities to improve people’s lives. Finding the right answer - we call it Expertise - to one’s individual problems remains a challenge today. The internet has made Expertise globally available, but discovery remains the challenge! There is no single place to discover Expertise, read, chat and – if needed – book a session with an Expert in a seamless and ‘All-in-One’ solution. At WikiExpert we have built an ‘All-in-One’ solution where our own AI will connect every user with the best Expertise and, if needed Expert. Since launch WikiExpert has already helped +250.000 users, connecting with Expertise of more than 3.000 Experts, reading the best of thousands specialist articles, chatting, or booking a 1:1 consultation. The unique WikiExpert concept works! Users spend already today on average +8 minutes per session in WikiExpert, outperforming other knowledge platforms by far. This is 3x longer than on Quora (2'39'‘) and nearly 5x longer than on Medium (1'47'’). Time spent shows the value WikiExpert creates! Global communities, focused on specific problems and solutions, deliver high value leads for advertisers and commercial partners, and outperform all other, noisy, social media platforms. We are currently fundraising to push our user growth and implement advertising features, aiming for first revenue in Q1’2023. Please connect with bruno.pereira@wikiexpert.com to receive our Pitch Deck or secure a meeting/call for further explanation. WikiExpert - Igniting AI-powered communities built around Expertise

P42med Logo
P42med
1-10
Feb 9, 2021
P42med is an innovative early-stage biotechnology startup focused on developing cutting-edge in silico drug design solutions to address the challenges of GPCR modulation. Leveraging the power of computational approaches, P42med aims to design allosteric transmembrane modulators using peptides or peptidomimetics, which hold the potential to fine-tune receptor activity, increasing specificity and signaling bias. This unique focus on allosteric modulation opens new avenues for drug discovery and development, targeting a wide range of therapeutics areas, including neurology, oncology, and metabolic disorders. Founded by a group of dedicated co-founders with expertise in computational biology, biophysics, and bioinformatics, P42med has successfully bootstrapped its operations since its inception. The team has developed a robust in silico pipeline and demonstrated promising activity for both allosteric and orthosteric modulators of GPCRs, positioning P42med at the forefront of innovative drug design strategies. The startup is exploring various routes of development, such as pursuing experimental results in the form of drug candidate libraries or focusing on further refining its unique in silico approach. P42med's vision is to revolutionize the drug discovery process through computational techniques, ultimately leading to the development of novel therapies that improve and extend people's lives. By bridging the gap between fundamental biomedical research and the pharmaceutical industry, P42med aims to accelerate the translation of groundbreaking research into life-changing medicines.
Bioinformatics, Biotechnology, Machine Learning, Pharmaceutical
Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland
in silico drug design solutions to address the challenges of GPCR modulation

00-801

AiPassportPhotos Logo
AiPassportPhotos
51-100
Apr 4, 2021
AiPassportPhotos is a comprehensive online platform that allows users to create high-quality ID photos for various purposes, including passport photos, visa photos, driver's license photos, and more. The website offers an easy-to-use interface that makes taking and editing photos a breeze. With its advanced AI technology, AiPassportPhotos ensures that users can create perfect ID photos that meet all the necessary requirements. The platform guides users through the process, offering helpful tips on how to take the perfect photo, ensuring that the final result meets the strict standards set by government agencies worldwide. In addition to its primary function of creating ID photos, AiPassportPhotos offers several other features that allow users to add some fun and creativity to their pictures. The Cartoon Selfie feature, for instance, lets users transform their photos into cartoon-style images, perfect for sharing on social media or printing as a fun souvenir. The Photo Enhancer feature, on the other hand, allows users to adjust the lighting, contrast, and color balance of their photos, ensuring that they look their best. AiPassportPhotos is designed to be easy and accessible for all users, regardless of their level of technical expertise. The website is mobile-responsive, making it easy to use on any device, including smartphones and tablets. There's no need to download any additional software, as everything can be done online, making it a convenient solution for busy individuals who need to take ID photos quickly. Explore fun tools: Photo Enhancer: https://www.aipassportphotos.com/photo-enhancer Cartoon Selfie: https://www.aipassportphotos.com/cartoon-selfie Remove Background: https://www.aipassportphotos.com/remove-background Blur Background: https://www.aipassportphotos.com/blur-background Old Photo Restoration: https://www.aipassportphotos.com/old-photo-restoration/ Color Correction: https://www.aipassportphotos.com/photo-color-correction

Smart Oasis Farm
1-10
Mar 2021
Intensive RnD period during last 5 years has given us an opportunities to create a number of products for global market. We wanted to make them convenient and profitable for the market, and become an excellent business tools for different market segments. These products have a number of unique production features. Each product is focused on fulfilling human vital needs, which ensures a steady demand for our products. We offer them with good profits of purchase and tangible benefits on operation. Smart Oasis Farm is an aeroponic farm producer that provides healthy food throughout the year in any climate zone. Compared with hydroponics - our product needs 99% less water and 90% less fertilizers. At the same time, aeroponics combined with CEA helps our clients to boost growth intensity up to 20%. Water independence is achieved through an additional unit which takes humidity from thin air. Each container farm can produce up to 8800kg annually. It is twice better than competitors while used for growing only 17kW of electricity per kg of lettuce with a challenge to drop it down to 10kW/kg in 2 years. Smart Oasis Farm is fully equipped with IoT, both sensors and actuators which manage the farm's climate and keep all data for the next AI optimization. Various crops can be grown in our farms: greens, vegetable, flowers, berries, CBD, with different dimensions and for any purpose. Smart Oasis Farm is scalable. Also one of the Recognised startups by Govt of India in the year 2021.Hellowcart name also a approved Trademark Brand by IP India. Hellowcart was started by the experts of the food industry to solve the major problem of the Restaurants. Hellowcart offers Dine-in, Self pickup and Online Delivery Services. Hellowcart provides service to restaurants at much Lower 8.5% commission.Which no other aggregator can take it on this. We are a Restaurant friendly flatform to give proper service to Restaurant and the users. It's Win to Win for Both. Delivery and Selfpickup are both services there in our app. It's Available on Android and IOS users also from Ecommerce Website as well users can order it. For the Restaurant we are providing Qr code menu for the dine-in. Which is we are offering completely free for the Restaurant to use it to explore their physical menu to smarter Digital menu cards. From this QR code menu restaurant customers can order from the table without any interaction and it will pass to the kitchen instantly. from this Restaurant can save the captain. Dine-in User can order the food as many times as possible from the table and can make the payment in the last checkout. Restaurants also get the data of users to know who is their customer and they can message them directly and offer the Discounts as well. Also We come of with multiple Delivery options as well like Restaurant can opt in for their own Delivery also. if Restaurant wants, they can offer free delivery as well and it may be faster than expected Delivery time. It's completely on Restaurant control to go about it. Our main AIM is to provide Restaurant food to users at the lowest price. because other aggregators charge around 24 to 30% commission so the item prices Restaurant should increase the price of the item around 40 to 50%. So users are paying a lot of money and also restaurants are not getting that. so there are a lot of differences. We use Google's Distance matrix API to Calculate the Proper Distance from the user and Restaurant and show the Near Restaurant to the user and also calculate the accurate Delivery charges. We Use Official Whatsapp Business Account to manage the Support and sales in a smarter way. Hellowcart uses smart auto Caller (OBD) services to communicate with users in quicker time and more reach. Queue based ordering system in the Restaurant partner app and dashboard to manage the orders.Also Advanced logic applied at live orders sections. Jan 4, 2021
We improved SEC data analysis and financial reporting for better accessibility and user-friendliness. Our team added visualizations, summaries, predictions, reports, and comparative functionality for a comprehensive view of any company's financial reports. You can make better decisions and increase profits with accurate information. We're committed to providing continuous improvement for your financial reporting and analysis needs. We work with over 13,000 datasets for companies that are monitored by SEC, regardless of their industry, by providing them with better data transparency, preparation, understanding, forecasting, and artificial intelligence predictions. We can help finance teams with their management reporting, regulatory reporting, budgeting, forecasting and analysis, which can provide value to a range of professionals, such as stockholders, management, asset managers, analysts, corporate finance, investment professionals, distribution, tax advisors, government, academics, and more. Our cloud solution is designed to help users access the right content quickly, and they can easily modify it with the click of a button, without having to know how to program. We have a proactive partnership and provide unmatched service, which makes data analysis more efficient and effective. Certified Financial Data (SEC & Other) Certified datasets of entity financials, industry comparisons, market data, forecasts, reports, visualizations, and dashboards for any entities. Our certified datasets are optimized data models that have evolved after leveraging our extensive business intelligence implementation experience, and international accounting knowledge and exposure since 1991. Knowing how accountants and analysts work, and what their reporting requirements are, enables us to take that right route in the evolvement of these certified financial datasets and optimized models. Model Structures Our mature optimized dataset models use a star schema approach with dimension and fact tables being defined for optimal efficiency. This is consistent with accepted modern data warehouse theory. Knowing financial user requirements, and how to combine these into a composite model, enable for efficient high performing optimized certified datasets and financial solutions. Datasets Datasets represent a source of data ready for reporting, visualization and dashboarding. A dataset is a collection of data that you import or connect to. We connect to and import all sorts of datasets and bring all of it together in one place. Datasets can also source data from dataflows. Datasets are stored in a workspace and can be accessed across workspaces for other reports and visualizations to leverage. Dataset types include: Existing data models Excel table(s) and/or a workbook data model, or CSV file uploads A push dataset A streaming or hybrid streaming datasets Other than streaming datasets, the dataset represents a data model, which leverages mature modeling technologies. We can connect to over 150 data sources, including SEC structured XBRL data. Get 10-K (Annual) , 10-Q (Quarterly), 8-K (Current) reports, notes, disclosures and more. Over 13,000 companies. Who ‘is’ OLAP Office™? A provider of financial datasets and Business Intelligence solutions for accountants, financial analysts and distributors. Why is OLAP Office™ different? By having a deep understanding of how accountants and analysts work, and by combining the decades of experience in the Business Intelligence arena, OLAP Office™ is able to unscramble the structured datasets into a form that analysts and accountants can understand. What is OLAP Office™? An independent provider of innovative, tried and tested financial dataset and Business Intelligence solutions, proactively servicing the individual requirements of each of its clients. What are the company abilities? OLAP Office™ can help you understand and incorporate your strategic vision along with a mature financial reporting and/or Business Intelligence solution, developed by an experienced team. In today’s economy, companies cannot afford to squander their information and people assets. It’s more common to hear “do more with less” or “focus resources on the most profitable activities”. However, often employees do not have access to the vital information they need to make timely decisions – as a result, new market opportunities are missed. OLAP Office™ offers best-in-class financial datasets, reporting and Business Intelligence solutions developed specifically to address the needs of your business. Improved accurate financial datasets, combined with the right analytical tools being put in the hands of decision makers, will translate directly to better and more timely and accurate decisions being made. This translates to reduced data costs and to a more profitable bottom line. Get it right the first time with OLAP Office™. Our Mission To become a leading provider of a suite of tools that enable Finance professionals to undertake business analysis, modelling and reporting using OLAP Office™ as its preferred partner. OLAP Office™ continually strives to evolve new innovative solutions and techniques. Company Profile OLAP Office™ is a niche provider of fast, efficient, dataset, analyst and management reporting solutions using Business Intelligence technology. The company, a leading team in this field internationally, is focused on the design, implementation, training for financial dataset solutions to a world-wide client base. Our consultants have been involved in the Business Intelligence market since as early 1991 and have worked with numerous leading Business Intelligence products. OLAP Office™ solutions are diverse and covered under the “Business Solutions” area. OLAP Offices experience ensures you have a correctly structured solution from day one which uses the correct Business Intelligence and relational technologies. The company invests time and effort into making customers effective, efficient and successful as you are our number one priority. Our objectives for client datasets and reporting solutions include: To improve the timeliness of financial information To improve the quality of information To improve the integrity of information To provide seamless integration between different reporting systems To provide best of breed technology for the solution required To train and educate the user on the technology being used To improve ease of use tools used by users We help you to: To collect, transform and organize the data To aggregate and model the data To understand the data To turn the data into information To turn the data into knowledge To use the data to predict the future To make smarter decisions To improve your bottom line To turn the data into an invaluable asset To evolve efficient processes To solve problems.

Prophyles Logo
Prophyles
1-10
Feb 21, 2021
Prophyles is reinventing Contact Management by pioneering a new category coined as Contacts-as-a-Service (CaaS). Prophyles is solving the lingering problems in contact management related to data integrity, accuracy, synchronization, up-to-date, and privacy. All current vendors, from low-end address books to high-end CRMs, use a centralized database which causes silos which are the main source of the problems. Prophyles took a unique and contrarian approach by using a decentralized and distributed database in a peer-to-peer network in which profiles are connected using "Smart Contracts" in a blockchain - which is the core of our patent. Prophyles provides your entire digital footprint and those of your contacts, without ever compromising your or their privacy, and without ever being outdated since all Personal Information is constantly updated from the cloud onto your or their device, just like updates of mobile apps. Prophyles offers you the most comprehensive and protected profile; reduces the probability of identity theft; connects you easily and safely with others through customizable digital cards that represent your different personas which prevent hackers, spammers, or even online predators from preying on your children; leverages your social network by capitalizing on the strength of your weak ties to get you qualified referrals; gets the latest scoop from social media about your contacts; finds people near you; records your daily events in a personalized diary; organizes your ideas in a customized journal; generates flavors of your resumes that are fed to job boards; completes online forms through AI-empowered APIs for you so that you don’t have to, etc. In short, Prophyles is your digital footprint in a truly connected and more secured new online world.

Trang Blog này là một cẩm nang về kim cương và các loại đá quý mà chúng tôi tổng hợp từ những nguồn thông tin chính thống được cung cấp bởi các nhà sản xuất đến các chuyên gia hàng đầu nghiên cứu về lĩnh vực đá quý trên khắp thế giới. Với những bài viết của mình, chúng tôi hy vọng có thể giúp các bạn độc giả yêu quý trang bị được những kiến thức cần thiết để có thể tự đánh giá được phần nào chất lượng của viên kim cương cũng như đá quý dựa theo màu sắc, độ tinh khiết, giác cắt và trọng lượng, để tránh khỏi những chiêu trò độn giá hoặc mua phải những viên kim cương kém chất lượng với số tiền quá lớn. Nhiều người bày tỏ sự bất ngờ và tò mò tại sao chúng tôi làm ra thư viện kiến thức khổng lồ này một cách miễn phí cho mọi người. Bởi chính chúng tôi, những người đã lăn lội rất lâu tại thị trường kim cương đá quý ở nước ngoài, cũng phải chật vật rất nhiều mà vẫn chưa tìm được một viên kim cương chất lượng phù hợp với túi tiền. Và tôi tin rằng nhiều người Việt Nam cũng vậy. Nên kimcuongdaquy.info được tạo ra với vai trò như một tòa thư viện thu nhỏ ghi chép đầy đủ kiến thức chuyên môn cũng như thông tin về các nơi mua bán kim cương uy tín, giúp những ai đang bối rối có thể lựa chọn được viên đá tốt nhất với ngân sách của mình.

Olap Office Inc Logo
Olap Office Inc
1-10
Jan 4, 2021
We improved SEC data analysis and financial reporting for better accessibility and user-friendliness. Our team added visualizations, summaries, predictions, reports, and comparative functionality for a comprehensive view of any company's financial reports. You can make better decisions and increase profits with accurate information. We're committed to providing continuous improvement for your financial reporting and analysis needs. We work with over 13,000 datasets for companies that are monitored by SEC, regardless of their industry, by providing them with better data transparency, preparation, understanding, forecasting, and artificial intelligence predictions. We can help finance teams with their management reporting, regulatory reporting, budgeting, forecasting and analysis, which can provide value to a range of professionals, such as stockholders, management, asset managers, analysts, corporate finance, investment professionals, distribution, tax advisors, government, academics, and more. Our cloud solution is designed to help users access the right content quickly, and they can easily modify it with the click of a button, without having to know how to program. We have a proactive partnership and provide unmatched service, which makes data analysis more efficient and effective. Certified Financial Data (SEC & Other) Certified datasets of entity financials, industry comparisons, market data, forecasts, reports, visualizations, and dashboards for any entities. Our certified datasets are optimized data models that have evolved after leveraging our extensive business intelligence implementation experience, and international accounting knowledge and exposure since 1991. Knowing how accountants and analysts work, and what their reporting requirements are, enables us to take that right route in the evolvement of these certified financial datasets and optimized models. Model Structures Our mature optimized dataset models use a star schema approach with dimension and fact tables being defined for optimal efficiency. This is consistent with accepted modern data warehouse theory. Knowing financial user requirements, and how to combine these into a composite model, enable for efficient high performing optimized certified datasets and financial solutions. Datasets Datasets represent a source of data ready for reporting, visualization and dashboarding. A dataset is a collection of data that you import or connect to. We connect to and import all sorts of datasets and bring all of it together in one place. Datasets can also source data from dataflows. Datasets are stored in a workspace and can be accessed across workspaces for other reports and visualizations to leverage. Dataset types include: Existing data models Excel table(s) and/or a workbook data model, or CSV file uploads A push dataset A streaming or hybrid streaming datasets Other than streaming datasets, the dataset represents a data model, which leverages mature modeling technologies. We can connect to over 150 data sources, including SEC structured XBRL data. Get 10-K (Annual) , 10-Q (Quarterly), 8-K (Current) reports, notes, disclosures and more. Over 13,000 companies. Who ‘is’ OLAP Office™? A provider of financial datasets and Business Intelligence solutions for accountants, financial analysts and distributors. Why is OLAP Office™ different? By having a deep understanding of how accountants and analysts work, and by combining the decades of experience in the Business Intelligence arena, OLAP Office™ is able to unscramble the structured datasets into a form that analysts and accountants can understand. What is OLAP Office™? An independent provider of innovative, tried and tested financial dataset and Business Intelligence solutions, proactively servicing the individual requirements of each of its clients. What are the company abilities? OLAP Office™ can help you understand and incorporate your strategic vision along with a mature financial reporting and/or Business Intelligence solution, developed by an experienced team. In today’s economy, companies cannot afford to squander their information and people assets. It’s more common to hear “do more with less” or “focus resources on the most profitable activities”. However, often employees do not have access to the vital information they need to make timely decisions – as a result, new market opportunities are missed. OLAP Office™ offers best-in-class financial datasets, reporting and Business Intelligence solutions developed specifically to address the needs of your business. Improved accurate financial datasets, combined with the right analytical tools being put in the hands of decision makers, will translate directly to better and more timely and accurate decisions being made. This translates to reduced data costs and to a more profitable bottom line. Get it right the first time with OLAP Office™. Our Mission To become a leading provider of a suite of tools that enable Finance professionals to undertake business analysis, modelling and reporting using OLAP Office™ as its preferred partner. OLAP Office™ continually strives to evolve new innovative solutions and techniques. Company Profile OLAP Office™ is a niche provider of fast, efficient, dataset, analyst and management reporting solutions using Business Intelligence technology. The company, a leading team in this field internationally, is focused on the design, implementation, training for financial dataset solutions to a world-wide client base. Our consultants have been involved in the Business Intelligence market since as early 1991 and have worked with numerous leading Business Intelligence products. OLAP Office™ solutions are diverse and covered under the “Business Solutions” area. OLAP Offices experience ensures you have a correctly structured solution from day one which uses the correct Business Intelligence and relational technologies. The company invests time and effort into making customers effective, efficient and successful as you are our number one priority. Our objectives for client datasets and reporting solutions include: To improve the timeliness of financial information To improve the quality of information To improve the integrity of information To provide seamless integration between different reporting systems To provide best of breed technology for the solution required To train and educate the user on the technology being used To improve ease of use tools used by users We help you to: To collect, transform and organize the data To aggregate and model the data To understand the data To turn the data into information To turn the data into knowledge To use the data to predict the future To make smarter decisions To improve your bottom line To turn the data into an invaluable asset To evolve efficient processes To solve problems.

Edlano is a micro-learning platform that can help people learn faster and more efficiently. Our platform is based on two main drivers, artificial intelligence and gamification. AI engines personalize contents and all of its different variables to make a unique learning path for each individual user. For instance, we might customize the interface, change playback speed, substitute the contents, and choose different interactive questions based on their behavior with the aim of saving time and inventing a wonderful experience. On the other hand, a gamification system would build an intrinsic motivation depending on the learner's player type in order to enjoy their way of mastery. For example, we use different game elements like leaderboard, special badges, streak days, and point system in non-game contexts like education. The combination of these drivers can create a delightful learning atmosphere. We are creating a new paradigm in the world of education.

Feb 1, 2021
Messages, games, and shopping sites never leave you. They keep sending notifications to get your attention, so your productivity, focus, and overall well-being are harmed. People across the globe are struggling with anxiety and depressive disorders. InFocus creates an application that blocks non-urgent notifications, shows urgent, and even responds to messages. It dramatically decreases stress, saves time, and increases productivity. The fact that AI-powered service cares about informing the user about the urgent and essential stuff creates peace of mind and reduces burnout. InFocus is the ultimate tool for creative people to concentrate and manage their working routine.

Prophyles Logo
Prophyles
1-10
Feb 21, 2021
Prophyles is reinventing Contact Management by pioneering a new category coined as Contacts-as-a-Service (CaaS). Prophyles is solving the lingering problems in contact management related to data integrity, accuracy, synchronization, up-to-date, and privacy. All current vendors, from low-end address books to high-end CRMs, use a centralized database which causes silos which are the main source of the problems. Prophyles took a unique and contrarian approach by using a decentralized and distributed database in a peer-to-peer network in which profiles are connected using "Smart Contracts" in a blockchain - which is the core of our patent. Prophyles provides your entire digital footprint and those of your contacts, without ever compromising your or their privacy, and without ever being outdated since all Personal Information is constantly updated from the cloud onto your or their device, just like updates of mobile apps. Prophyles offers you the most comprehensive and protected profile; reduces the probability of identity theft; connects you easily and safely with others through customizable digital cards that represent your different personas which prevent hackers, spammers, or even online predators from preying on your children; leverages your social network by capitalizing on the strength of your weak ties to get you qualified referrals; gets the latest scoop from social media about your contacts; finds people near you; records your daily events in a personalized diary; organizes your ideas in a customized journal; generates flavors of your resumes that are fed to job boards; completes online forms through AI-empowered APIs for you so that you don’t have to, etc. In short, Prophyles is your digital footprint in a truly connected and more secured new online world.
Apps, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Information Services, Mobile, Software
San Jose, California, United States

Kim Cương Đá Quý
1-10
Mar 8, 2021
Trang Blog này là một cẩm nang về kim cương và các loại đá quý mà chúng tôi tổng hợp từ những nguồn thông tin chính thống được cung cấp bởi các nhà sản xuất đến các chuyên gia hàng đầu nghiên cứu về lĩnh vực đá quý trên khắp thế giới. Với những bài viết của mình, chúng tôi hy vọng có thể giúp các bạn độc giả yêu quý trang bị được những kiến thức cần thiết để có thể tự đánh giá được phần nào chất lượng của viên kim cương cũng như đá quý dựa theo màu sắc, độ tinh khiết, giác cắt và trọng lượng, để tránh khỏi những chiêu trò độn giá hoặc mua phải những viên kim cương kém chất lượng với số tiền quá lớn. Nhiều người bày tỏ sự bất ngờ và tò mò tại sao chúng tôi làm ra thư viện kiến thức khổng lồ này một cách miễn phí cho mọi người. Bởi chính chúng tôi, những người đã lăn lội rất lâu tại thị trường kim cương đá quý ở nước ngoài, cũng phải chật vật rất nhiều mà vẫn chưa tìm được một viên kim cương chất lượng phù hợp với túi tiền. Và tôi tin rằng nhiều người Việt Nam cũng vậy. Nên kimcuongdaquy.info được tạo ra với vai trò như một tòa thư viện thu nhỏ ghi chép đầy đủ kiến thức chuyên môn cũng như thông tin về các nơi mua bán kim cương uy tín, giúp những ai đang bối rối có thể lựa chọn được viên đá tốt nhất với ngân sách của mình.

Holmes is a SaaS startup focused on simplifying process automation for businesses of all sizes. Our intuitive platform allows anyone, even without technical knowledge, to map and automate repetitive business processes. With Holmes, there's no need for coding. Just drag and drop pre-configured blocks representing common steps, such as collecting inputs, moving data between systems, sending notifications, and more. In minutes, you can build automated workflows by connecting these blocks. In addition to facilitating no-code automation, the Holmes platform uses artificial intelligence to continuously optimize processes, delivering actionable insights for continuous improvement. All managed from a simple and visual interface. What truly sets Holmes' automation platform apart is the cutting-edge artificial intelligence at its core. This proprietary AI observes each automated process, collects data, detects patterns, and identifies opportunities. Over time, it automatically optimizes workflows, ensuring they remain dynamic and tailored to the actual needs of businesses. Furthermore, it provides practical insights and guidance on how to further improve automation. While the competition relies on human users to monitor and adjust, Holmes' AI works tirelessly in the background to deliver increasingly efficient automations. It's like having an automation and optimization expert working 24/7 on your team. This AI-driven approach to management and continuous improvement is a significant differentiator for Holmes. PathFree Technologies Corporation Logo
PathFree Technologies Corporation
11-50
Mar 23, 2021
PathFree Technologies Corporation is a prominent medical device manufacturer based in Irvine, California, deeply committed to leveraging American ingenuity and manufacturing. The company prides itself on its dedication to producing innovative, high-quality products that cater to the modern healthcare sector. Under the leadership of President Lianna Zhang and CEO Perry M. Brunette, PathFree Technologies has made significant strides in the medical device industry, focusing on AI-driven emergency medical solutions. Lianna Zhang, with a rich background in health and wellness, brings over 20 years of successful entrepreneurship to her role at PathFree. Her journey from Beijing to the United States has been marked by resilience and a commitment to community involvement, making her a role model in the entrepreneurial space​​. Perry Brunette, the co-founder and CEO, is known for his financial acumen and technological insight, particularly in the medical device sector. His leadership has been pivotal in steering PathFree towards innovation and significant growth. Brunette's approach to blending finance with technology, especially evident in projects like the AiCart, underscores the company's commitment to advancing healthcare through innovation​​. Dr. Kongyuan He, serving as the Chief Advisory Officer, brings extensive medical expertise to the company. With a specialization in anesthesiology, Dr. He has been a driving force in medical innovation, particularly with the development of the “Intelligent Code Cart,” now enhanced with AI and other advanced features through PathFree Technologies' efforts​​. PathFree Technologies has recently grabbed headlines for its astonishing valuation leap from $112 million to over $1 billion within just seven months, thanks to its flagship device, the AiCart, and the anticipation of additional groundbreaking medical devices. This valuation reflects the potential of PathFree's technology to transform emergency medical care​​. The company has just made a significant appearance on Kevin Harrington's talk show "Getting Down to Business," which presented an opportunity to showcase the AiCart to a wider audience and highlight PathFree's evolution into a leading AI firm in the medical device sector​​. PathFree's unwavering commitment to American manufacturing is a cornerstone of its identity. The company ensures that all its manufacturing processes are kept within the United States to maintain the highest quality standards and support the American economy. By sourcing raw materials and components from American suppliers, PathFree not only champions the Made in America ethos but also contributes to job creation and economic growth domestically​​. In conclusion, PathFree Technologies Corporation represents a blend of visionary leadership, technological innovation, and a strong commitment to American manufacturing and quality. Its focus on AI-driven solutions in the medical device industry positions it as a forward-thinking company with a bright future in enhancing healthcare standards globally.

MarketMind Technologies Inc. Logo
MarketMind Technologies Inc.
1-10
Mar 18, 2021
MarketMind is a network of generative AI-based chatbots that talk to investors - created by founders of the world’s largest newswire and IR technology platforms. With retail investors now owning the majority of the world’s publicly-traded shares, it’s more important than ever that companies take control of their narrative on social media, stock message boards and investment research sites. Tailor-fitted to the back offices of public companies, MarketMind scans clients’ corporate materials and synthesizes this material to generate chatbot content. The platform uses predictive analytics to scan social media and other online investor conversations to help inform its large language model on anticipated questions. The result is a broad network of chatbots on multiple web sites that provide retail investors with a deeper and more accurate level of insight on clients’ operations than that which is available on public and professional stock research sites.
Digital Media, Finance, Financial Services, FinTech
Toronto, Ontario, Canada

Bonnabit Company INC. Logo
Bonnabit Company INC.
51-100
Apr 2021
Bonnabit is an innovative e-commerce blockchain platform that integrates blockchain and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to provide secure transactions, personalized shopping experiences, and global accessibility. It features the Bonnabit Token, a digital currency designed to streamline payments, reward users, and enhance the overallshopping experience. Bonnabit aims to revolutionize online commerce by offering a user-centric, transparent, and efficient marketplace for consumers and merchants worldwide. Security and Trust through Blockchain In an era where data breaches and fraud are of paramount concern, Bonnabit leverages blockchain technology to secure every transaction. Blockchain's inherent features – decentralization, immutability, and transparency – ensure that each purchase and sale is recorded securely and openly. This not only enhances trust among platform users but also significantly reduces the risk of fraudulent activities and disputes, fostering a safer online marketplace. Personalization with Artificial Intelligence Bonnabit employs AI to deliver a personalized shopping experience that anticipates and meets individual consumer preferences. From product recommendations to optimized search results, AI analyzes user behavior, preferences, and purchasing history to tailor the shopping experience for each user. This personalized approach not only enhances customer satisfaction but also boosts merchant visibility and sales, creating a virtuous cycle of engagement and growth. The Bonnabit Token: A Catalyst for Engagement At the heart of Bonnabit's ecosystem lies the Bonnabit Token, a cryptocurrency that powers transactions, rewards engagement, and facilitates loyalty within the platform. This digital currency simplifies the purchasing process, offering users a fast, secure, and efficient means of payment. Furthermore, the token incentivizes participation through a rewards system, encouraging users to contribute reviews, refer new customers, and engage with the platform on a deeper level. Global Accessibility Bonnabit is committed to making e-commerce truly global. By addressing language barriers, currency exchange issues, and international shipping challenges, Bonnabit opens up the world's marketplaces to consumers and merchants alike. This global approach not only expands the customer base for merchants but also ensures that consumers have access to a vast array of products, regardless of geographical boundaries. Sustainable and Ethical E-Commerce Understanding the growing consumer demand for sustainability and ethical practices, Bonnabit integrates eco-friendly initiatives and supports merchants who adhere to sustainable production methods. The platform encourages the use of green packaging, promotes products with lower environmental impact, and aims to reduce the carbon footprint of its operations. By prioritizing sustainability, Bonnabit aligns with the values of environmentally conscious consumers and merchants. The Future of Bonnabit As Bonnabit continues to grow and evolve, its commitment to innovation, security, and user-centric features remains steadfast. With plans to further integrate cutting-edge technologies and expand its global footprint, Bonnabit is poised to lead the next wave of e-commerce evolution. For consumers and merchants looking for a secure, personalized, and globally accessible online shopping experience, Bonnabit offers a glimpse into the future of retail.

ClickHouse Logo
ClickHouse
101-250
Aug 11, 2021
ClickHouse is an open-source column-oriented DBMS for online analytical processing that enables users to produce analytical reports in real time by running SQL queries. The actual column-oriented DBMS design is at the heart of ClickHouse’s uniqueness. This distinct design provides compact storage with no unnecessary data accompanying the values, which significantly improves processing performance. It uses vectors to process data, which improves CPU efficiency and contributes to ClickHouse’s exceptional speed.

Circu Li-ion Logo
Circu Li-ion
11-50
Jun 2021
Circu Li-ion is a battery upcycling company headquartered in Luxembourg, with a mission to accelerate the green revolution and achieve sustainable economic electrification. Our goal is to maximize the value of each battery and promote a truly environmentally friendly approach. We distinguish ourselves from traditional recycling methods that destroy entire batteries when only 10% of cells have reached their end-of-life, wasting valuable resources. Instead, we focus on reusing still-functioning battery components, saving them from being prematurely recycled. Our automated and scalable process can recover up to 90% of end-of-life battery cells and components, greatly reducing environmental impact. With the aid of AI and machine vision, our proprietary algorithm gathers data at each stage, enabling the creation of an automated and scalable battery library. Our approach revolutionizes battery recycling, cutting costs, and reducing battery-related CO2 emissions by 48% compared to a traditional battery life cycle. We offer this cutting-edge technology to leading players in the EV, micromobility, and powertools industries, throughout the value chain from sourcing and manufacturing to recycling.
Battery, CleanTech, Energy Storage, Recycling, Sustainability
Hesperange, Luxembourg, Luxembourg
Circu Li-ion is an automated battery and cell upcycling company that maximizes the value of each battery.

Jul 27, 2021
Ochy is that app that uses video and AI to bring lab quality analysis on a smartphone so people can evaluate their technique whenever and wherever they want. The core AI technology is built to analyse the movement of people and built on top of this is an algorithm to determine if someone has the correct biomechanical movement in running situations. Base on the AI analysis, we identify the weak points of the person and provide an exercise plan to improve the weak points so the athlete can prevent injuries and run more efficiently. The core AI technology can be used in several situations. Coaches: Help a coach to understand their athlete and create a good training program Runners: Help runners who don’t have a coach to evaluate their technique and have a plan to improve Medical Professionals: Help medical professionals (kine, Osteo) to evaluate the technique of their patients and provide the good rehab

By employing advanced machine learning techniques, SquareML enables the extraction of meaningful insights from healthcare data. As such, we target investments in companies building in four specific areas: - Sustainability transition Renewable energy, climate change mitigation, alternative food sources, agritech, biodiversity conservation, and water management. - Healthcare development Innovative treatment methods, pharmaceutical breakthroughs, digital health solutions, and technologies that revolutionise patient care and medical research. - Human advancement From scientific technologies able to disrupt the way we live, to academic research and IP-protected inventions. - Responsible technology From ethical AI to robust cybersecurity, from data protection to data anonymisation techniques. Salem Cyber Logo
Salem Cyber
1-10
Jul 1, 2021
Salem Cyber builds Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions that work collaboratively with people to address scalability challenges in cybersecurity operations. We believe AI is most effective when it can collaborate with people, merging their creativity and institutional knowledge with the scalability of machines. Their product, Salem, is an AI-based cyber analyst designed to increase the number of alert investigations your organization can perform. Salem runs a tier 1 and 2-style investigation on the 100’s or 1000’s of alerts that are too noisy to go into your SOC, and then escalates back the handful that are most likely to be actual cyber threats. By running in some cases 100x or more investigations, Salem gives you the opportunity to identify threats that might have previously flown under the radar, leading to a decreased time-to-detect and an increased ROI of other cyber detection tech you’ve invested in. The company was founded in 2021 and is headquartered in Winston-Salem, North Carolina.

BlinkLab Logo
BlinkLab
11-50
Aug 17, 2021
An app that turns an ordinary mobile phone into a device for conducting objective neurobehavioral tests could make it easier and more cost-effective to diagnose neurological disorders. The BlinkLab smartphone application enables remote neurobehavioral testing in children and adults to help diagnose and monitor neurological disorders such as schizophrenia, autism and attention deficit hyperactive disorder. The app can also be used in neuroscience and psychology research to study fundamental mechanisms underlying learning and memory formation. Until now, these tests have required dedicated hardware in a permanent lab environment with substantial face-to-face interaction between researcher and participant. The new app is user-friendly, especially for infants and autistic patients since no face attachments are needed. The BlinkLab smartphone app allows performance of neurobehavioral tests remotely using the user’s own cell phone. Anyone can do the tests by themselves at home following the user-friendly instructions provide by the app. Experiments can be programmed by the healthcare professionals or researchers and selected from a list on the smartphone by the user. Data acquired with BlinkLab can be securely shared with healthcare professionals or researchers During a typical evaluation, the user will watch an entertaining movie or play a simple video game on the smartphone, while the smartphone delivers short auditory and visual stimuli in specific patterns. A test takes about 10-20 minutes. Using state-of-the-art computer vision algorithms, BlinkLab will measure the motor and emotional responses of the user to these stimuli. For most experiments, the main focus will be on eye movements and eye blinks. BlinkLab provides a behavioral readout using machine-vision algorithms, which can be used to characterize specific movements at video frames.
Health Care, Software
Princeton, New Jersey, United States
Diagnose and monitor neurological disorders such as autism using advanced facial recognition and AI techniques.

Dynaccurate Logo
Dynaccurate
1-10
May 15, 2021
Dynacurate solves the issue of managing ongoing changes to medical codes, clinical terminologies and controlled vocabularies. Currently ontologies in the health and life sciences sectors rely on a huge amount of manual reconciliation, but Dynaccurate's AI reduces this work from months to days, using a highly sophisticated algorithm that took many years to create. Dynaccurate is particularly relevant to the Health and Life Sciences industries as these sectors are using Clinicial Terminologies such as SNOMED, ICD, MedDRA, as well as extracts from regulatory databases. These terminologies are required to manage, for example: - Maintaining large scale knowledge graphs with multiple clinical terminologies in scope, for example in drug research - Accurate codes and terms in Electronic Patient Records - Maintaining specific Health Ontologies, for example medical procedure catalogues, such as imaging - Providing a 'semantic layer' for a health data warehouse. As health records age, codes and terms go out of date, yet Dynaccurate can provide the equivalent, in-use terms to apply on top of the records, providing equivalence across the entire body of data; - Providing updates to codes and terms used in Medical Coding, Billing and Reimbursement (for hospitals and patients); - Medical data sharing in general, especially between upstream/downstream actors, as well as cross-border. Dynaccurate can also be used in non-clinical areas, such as Controlled Vocabularies uses in Translation, Public Administration and Security & Defence.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Health Care, Information Technology, Knowledge Management, Semantic Web, Software
Esch-sur-alzette, Luxembourg, Luxembourg

11-50
Jun 3, 2021
Arkchat is a messaging platform that helps organisation teams collaborate efficiently with each other and with vendors, partners, and customers. Teams can manage operations and projects through day-to-day messaging. Arkchat has a built-in marketplace that helps organisations and freelancers get new business leads and collaborate with buyers to close deals. Team Collaboration Organisations can invite vendors, partners, and customers to collaborate with their teams. Diverse team members in messaging groups can converse privately with select group members to keep conversations and attachments private. Users can organise messages in groups topic-wise for easy reference and trackability. Group members can use Generative AI, Google and YouTube in day-to-day messaging to increase productivity. Now, teams from across the world can easily collaborate because Arkchat automatically translates messages into users’ first language. Manage operations and projects. Teams can manage operations and projects effortlessly by converting day-to-day messages to tasks and approval requests. One-click converts any message into a trackable task or approval request, providing analytics about tasks, approvals, and team members’ performance. Multiple firms working on a project can manage tasks and client approvals effortlessly without dedicated project management resources. Arkchat also helps large organisations with corporate governance by giving them a permanent record of trackable approvals. Get new business opportunities Arkchat messaging platform with a built-in marketplace lets users post their products and services, get new leads, and collaborate with buyers through automatically created buyer/seller groups. Its team collaboration, task assignment capabilities and approval-seeking feature in buyer/seller groups help sellers and buyers discuss custom solutions and quotes. On the one hand, organisations looking for products or services can find and finalise vendors, while on the other hand, professional firms, freelancers, and product sellers get new business opportunities.

Buzzer solves the biggest problem in sales, huge amounts of money lost each year because of leads falling through the cracks in the funnel, which roots in wrongfully rejected leads; inefficient lead distribution; bad timing of engagement and inaccurate ICP. Buzzer generates actionable insights on when & how to approach each lead and uncovers lead rescue opportunities to yield maximum revenue. Account executives and S/BDRs make everyday decisions with gut instinct which result in a huge loss of revenue, these decisions are who to approach, whom should approach, how to approach (resolving objections) and with what offering. MQL to sale conversion is somewhere between 10-20% which means that 80-90% of the budget spent on generating these leads is trashed. PrescriberPoint Logo
PrescriberPoint
11-50
Aug 1, 2021
PrescriberPoint is “Kayak” for prescribers looking for an easier, one-stop-shop way to get their patients on therapy who may be facing complex coverage, affordability and patient start challenges. We are disrupting the $100Bn+ the pharma industry spends on healthcare providers (HCPs) which includes HCP marketing, field teams and hub-services. Our goal is to build an alternative to these fragmented, pharma-centric solutions with an HCP-centric, aggregation-based approach. Our marketplace platform aggregates all the resources HCPs need for the over 35k marketed drugs in the US to look up and evaluate a drug, research and find coverage and affordability options for patients, order samples and take other actions to get patients started on therapy. Our AI and software tools provide decision-support and workflow automation to cut down on the two days a week doctors offices report they spend dealing with these bureaucratic challenges. As a “connector” platform, like other aggregators like Kayak, Zillow and Cars.com, we are making it easy for HCPs to tap into other solutions across the prescribing journey that can help facilitate patient starts such as RTBI, ePA and pharmacy offerings. Our solution is free for HCPs. Our business model relies on charging pharma brands a monthly subscription fee for premium services designed to help targeted HCPs take advantage of the content, tools and services offered through the brand’s PrescriberPoint “microsite”.
