BEETLE Logo
BEETLE
1-10
Jul 10, 2021
We are a pre-stage startup currently in our research & development phase. Our community will be operating on an A.I based platform which is being developed by our core team. The platform will be available to the users in the form of an android/ios app and will also be accessible through the web. Our platform aims to solve the problems a student faces throughout his school and college life. Maybe it is the fear of losing in the journey or the frustration of not getting an internship/ job/skilled courses. In today's time there are many websites, companies for single work maybe the work be to receive the best career guidance or be accessing good mental health care or finding a career opportunity for that today's generation have to roam through 1000’s of websites and 100’s of apps but atlast very few people are able to get what they wanted, major thing that becomes a barrier is lack of skills and high prices for accessing these services online from various websites and app , This is where we come in our platform will eliminate these barriers and make the things easier and convenient , from now on the users will not have to roam on 100’s and 1000’s of app/web because they’ll get all that on a single community platform “Beetle”. The main thing would be that all the services would be at very reasonable prices with more than 85% of the content on the platform available for free. According to “Google” more than 20% of teenagers suffer depression at least once before entering adulthood and manier times this happens because of not getting proper counselling and mental health care at early stage, Manier times the teens hesitate to tell this to their parents and keep it all inside them which leads to depression, to eliminate this depression hypocrisy our community would be havin a proper mental health care section where counsellors and doctors would be assisting the depression/anxiety youngsters through 1 on 1 video chat or text chat apart from the regular podcasts and live sessions on mental health and motivation in life. All this would be completely free of cost. A graduation from premier Indian colleges like IIT,NIT,DTU,BITS or abroad colleges like stanford,Oxford,Harvard,MIT is not everything. Skills matter more than a degree & a lot of companies like google & cred have realised this and have brought changes in their hiring process for the same, But At Least in India people still haven't realised this yet . Beetle focuses on eradicating this thought amongst Indians by proving them wrong . We plan to develop special courses by professors of top notch Indian and abroad colleges coming together. This would be a short term skill specific diploma course in preferred subject like computer science, Electronics,etc with guaranteed internship and job in tech giants and startups to kick start their career as experienced professional, All this at upto 90% lesser fees than a premier college. Entertainment is a very crucial part of our lives which works as a stress reliever but while getting entertained if we are learning something then nothing could be better than that for a student. That's where “Beetle”brings in originals and 3rd party featured content on our platform through which students learn while getting entertained. We also plan to collaborate with ott providers like netflix,prime videos, hotstar, sony, to avail all their content for all are users on a single platform and they don’t need to now spend on buying ott subscriptions. Educational stuff i.e both academic and non academic stuff for school and college students prepared and developed by best professionals and college professors from reputed colleges. Which will help students cope up with their academic studies and there would be no need to hire a tutor. Non academic stuffs will contain finance, investments, tech, design,personality development, new language learning, etc Public & Private communities, Appart from a public community run by beetle for individual users were they can make new friends, follow other people, answer the questions posted on community handles by users something similar to quora, they can also build social profile something similar to instagram, Stream content, watch ott content with their friends in steam rooms something similar to discord. we’ll also have the option of private community which will have selected users in it upon invite of the community admin, and an extension to this will be a business private community for student organizations, institutes , school/colleges, student clubs which will be paid and with more customized feature like webinar studio, library, document locker, forums, survey builder, student portfolio etc REVENUE GENERATION STRATEGIES Initially all the features would be free of cost and our primary source would be ad revenue which means users will need to watch advertisements while accessing content from our platform. At later stages when we’ll have a decent or good amount of users then we’ll bring paid subscription which will make the platform ad free for the paid users We’ll continue with the free accounts as usual they’ll be watching ads but additionally some of the features (15%-20%) will be inaccessible for free users these 15%-20% features will come under premium category and will be available to paid users.These premium features will majorly contain exclusive live academic courses for school and college students, OTT content, Diploma courses & Training,etc

StockFink Logo
StockFink
1-10
Sep 2021
Only 6% of people globally invest in the stock market. Of those that do, 70% of lose money. This is because the underlying complexity and uncertainty in financial markets makes it hard to make good decisions, and in turn that makes us afraid to invest. But it shouldn’t be this way. This this is not what financial markets were designed to be. Making financial markets predictable is a necessary shift towards a more inclusive, transparent, and rational financial system. Our goal is to change how and who invests in stocks. We leverage artificial intelligence, algorithmic design, technological advancements and financial knowledge to give individual investors the necessary tools to differentiate between noise and information, giving everyone equal access to the world's economic engine. Financial markets should be predictable.This is what we are doing at StockFink: giving everybody equal access to stock investing through AI. By doing this, we are committed to 3 of the 17 SDGs introduced by the UN. At StockFink, we are not just wanting to provide a service; we're advocating for a shift in who and how we engage in our societies.

frankie Logo
frankie
1-10
Jun 5, 2021
frankie is a user focused mental health and wellness platform powered by AI which empowers users to take charge of their mental health and wellness through positivity-reinforced routines (positive psychology). The name is derived from the term 'frankly speaking' - a direct connotation of how mental health issues should be discussed. We believe that de-stigmatising mental health and empowering our users with the knowledge, support and guidance to deal with personal stressors is the key to healthier minds and better run lives. frankie focuses on preventative mental health and wellness care for all by taking steps to detect, identify and intervene by - controlling stress, increasing resilience and boosting low self-esteem. Our approach to personal wellness works thru 4 key pillars: Content Education, Daily Activities, Community Support and Professional Therapy. Through a gamified process that rewards consistency and habit-building, users on the frankie platform take up a lifetime journey that rewards them to strengthen their mental health and wellness. Unlike other wellness platforms, we provide multidisciplinary and multi-level approach interventions (physical, psychological, social, familial) that are designed for each developmental stage and aimed at minimising the impact of risk factors.

Thanks to local real-time data from our sensors, we can optimize the use of crop protection products. Factors influencing the development of the plants, such as variety and stage of development, as well as the form of production, optimally influence our forecasts and the associated recommendations for action. Thanks to various alarm functions, we help the producer to optimally monitor his fields. databaum has independently validated his mechanistic disease prognosis models in 2022, on which the AI/ML prognosis models will be based. databaum is open to partnerships and collaboration.

SentioCX Logo
SentioCX
11-50
Aug 12, 2021
We believe that the proliferation of conversational & generative AI has sparked a strong desire to not only optimize automated responses, but also to create harmony among bots, agents, and knowledge workers. At SentioCX we focus on the latter as we believe that virtual agents and live agents should work together seamlessly to provide the best possible customer experience. We focus exclusively on conversation orchestration and triaging/routing conversations from digital channels/conversational AI to an agent workspace in order to provide a truly 'seamless' hand-off from bots/conversational AI to live agents. We have been granted a US patent on our routing algorithm. In fact, instead of routing conversations in queues or throwing these conversations over the fence in ‘unassigned inboxes’ we provide triaging and intelligent routing into the agent workspace and if necessary, notify reserve agents or keep low-priority conversations (based on intent) in the bot temporarily to make room for more important conversations.

Break The Web is a real-time, AI-powered scoreboard of what’s trending online. It tracks all the conversations the internet is having, ranks them by virality, shows different viewpoints for each one, and synthesizes them into one-of-a-kind AI summary cards that provide the essentials of every story instantly. The product is powered by a proprietary data processing technology (CT-X) that sorts and ranks the internet by theme in real time with no human involvement. This technology pairs perfectly with Large Language Models like ChatGPT, enabling them to process current events in real time and at scale. SmartPlant AI Logo
SmartPlant AI
1-10
May 8, 2021
+40 million people in west africa are exposed to food insecurity and famine; this is caused by successive poor harvests, due to disease, lack of access to agricultural engineers and especially of financial resources. Therefore, diagnosis is one of the most important aspects of a plant pathologist's training. Without proper identification of the disease and the causing agent, disease control measures can be a waste of time and money and can lead to further plant losses. Proper disease diagnosis is therefore vital. That’s why we are building SmartPlant AI. A digital mobile application using AI & Machine Learning to facilitate plant analysis with prevention and access to micro-loans for local smallholders; Our vision is to be an essential partner for +3 Billion smallholders in Africa, and create +10.000 jobs across africa.
AgTech, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, Software
Quebec, Quebec, Canada
AI & Machine Learning to facilitate plant analysis with prevention for farmers and access to loans;

Smoov Inc Logo
Smoov Inc
1-10
Sep 1, 2021
Smoov is the first platform built to help couples automatically split and manage their shared expenses, before they have a shared bank account. Millions of couples are sending money back and forth every single day and money is the number one reason relationships fail. Today the process for splitting bills and expenses is manual, time consuming, and can be awkward or tense, plus no one likes doing math. Smoov makes it automatic, accurate and easy. While mirroring consumer behavior of sending money to each other via mobile. How? Smoov integrates with users' existing credit and debit cards and pulls transactions into a private running list. This creates a very low barrier to entry and eliminates awkward conversations about signing up for a new card together - plus they don't want to do that anyway. Couples set up a default split % for all of their shared expenses that they can adjust on a per transaction basis if they want. Users swipe which expenses they want to move from their private view to the couples shared view. Smoov keeps track of the total damage (who owes who how much) and whenever the couple is ready, they can settle up via direct ACH transfer through Smoov. Why? Modern couples who value their financial autonomy are getting married later in life, with more independent wealth and studies show they are fully merging their respective finances less and less - in a world where timing is everything, Smoov fits perfectly into that macro trend among others.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Consumer Software, FinTech, Machine Learning, Software
Venice, California, United States
Smoov is an AI driven application for couples to automatically split and manage shared finances together.

Cat's Eye Logo
Cat's Eye
1-10
May 24, 2021
Cat’s Eye company has developed an AI-based audio-visual real-time violence detector that alerts the related school staff member in case it detects the occurrence of a bullying incident. The alert includes the exact location, number of people involved, and type of bullying. However, due to the sensitive nature of the matter and to ensure the privacy of students’ data the AI model has not been equipped with face-recognition technology so the identity of the students will remain anonymous. It is important to understand that many of the bullying incidents that escalate to an out-of-proportion degree could have been prevented if intervention took place during the earlier stages of the incident. However, the sad truth is that a large number of bullying incidents occur in very near proximity to a school staff member and go unnoticed. To put it simply, our mission is to prevent bullying incidents from occurring at schools. As such, what we value above all is the physical and mental safety of children at schools.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Computer, Computer Vision, Information Technology, Public Safety, Software

GOENOMICS Logo
GOENOMICS
1-10
Jun 8, 2021
Mendle makes genome data analysis available and affordable. Genome analyses are the basis for most research and development projects in the life sciences. Genome data is used, for example, to study the effects of drug candidates in animal experiments in the pharmaceutical industry. Genome mapping is crucial for breeding new varieties in the seed industry, and in biotechnology for developing yeasts with new properties. Every day, thousands of genomes are sequenced worldwide. However, most of this data is difficult to find and usually only one aspect of the data is analysed. Analysing genome data means assigning a function to each individual letter in the genome. The difficulty is that genomes are up to 30 billion letters long but consist of only 4 different letters. And only about 1% of the letters in the genome contain important information like genes. Based on 20 years of genome research, we have developed a new, proprietary software, which we use in combination with a database of all the world's sequenced creatures to perform genome analyses with unprecedented quality and speed. Customers can have their own genomes analysed in service or use mendle, a Google-like search, to search our database for information that interests them.
AgTech, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Big Data, Bioinformatics, Biopharma, Biotechnology, Life Science, Machine Learning, Pharmaceutical, Software
Göttingen, Niedersachsen, Germany
Mendle makes genome data analysis available and affordable.

Poemusart Logo
Poemusart
1-10
Jun 1, 2021
Poemusart is a first-of-its-kind platform for truly creative people to exhibit and monetize their work while providing real entertainment to the public and social engagement. Creators on Poemusart upload their poems, music, and art, then use our editor to digitally combine all three to create a new medium we call "Poemusart". This new combination a moving image, spoken poem and background music is a lot more entertaining. Creators on Poemusart can speak or write their poems in their own unique style on various topics, from current affairs to comedy, from short stories to inspirational messages. All are translatable into 21 spoken languages at the click of a button. Most people would not usually read a poem or scroll through art, but when poems, music, and art are combined, this new combination becomes a lot more entertaining. Creators on poemusart.com can speak or write their poems in their own unique style on various topics, from current affairs to comedy, from short stories to inspirational messages. All are translatable into 21 spoken languages at the click of a button. Users of poemusart.com are categorized as viewers, creators, and advertisers. Viewers can stream the algorithm-curated Poemusarts as entertainment and discuss it in the comments section. And advertisers display their brands on the website. Advertisers and users are also able to commission creators to create content for them in exchange for tokens. Viewers can also purchase a subscription. Subscription benefits include: creation of a playlist; skipping advertisements; use of the Text to Poem AI; and use of the Text to Art AI. On poemusart.com, "NFT" (non-fungible token) means that we endeavor to make sure that each poem, music, and art uploaded is not a duplicate of one that already exists on the site. It is not blockchain. It is very easy to use for everyone. We also make sure that each combination of poem, music, and art that constitutes a Poemusart is a one-of-a-kind combination. The primary purpose of the site is entertainment, similar to video streaming sites like TikTok.com. A Poemusart is like a video in that, when played, the viewer sees moving digital art and hears a spoken poem with music playing in the background. Creators and composers that contribute to the site are able to monetize their Poemusarts by receiving gifts in the form of tokens or through ownership transfers in exchange for tokens. The tokens on poemusart.com are similar to the tokens on Tiktok.com or the coins on Reddit.com; they are not crypto currency and only serve to lubricate gifts and exchanges on the site. The ownership transfer of a Poemusart is not the same as transactions on NFT platforms. Poemusarts cannot be downloaded from the site. There is no risk of your collection being stolen from the site. Also, on other social media sites like TikTok.com, there are many duplicates of the same videos or concepts. Users copy each other's content because they seek the benefits of having that particular video on their page. On poemusart.com, since we take strides to ensure that each Poemusart cannot be duplicated, the only way users can acquire other coveted Poemusarts is by transferring ownership in exchange for tokens. Benefits of ownership include increased traffic to the owner's collection, more attention, more discussions, more donations, and possible ad revenue sharing. Like the text-to-poem and text-to-art A.I. functions, the text-to-music A.I. function will allow users to simply type in certain keywords such as genre, styles, tempos, and moods into the text box, and the A.I. will generate a piece of music from that prompt.
Independent Music, Music, News, Non-Fungible Token (NFT), Social Bookmarking, Social Impact, Social Media Advertising, Social News, Video, Video Advertising

Poemusart is a social media platform where poets, musicians, and artists can combine their poems, music, and art into a single stream medium

LuluLand World(USA) --- LuluLand is an event-driven tech platform empowering digital content with immersive space visualization for the open metaverse. LuluLand is building an event planning platform that allows users to co-create and share events with the help of AI and Blockchain Technology. LuluLand is a cutting-edge and innovative event-driven technology platform that serves as a driving force behind the transformation of digital content within the open metaverse. This platform is designed to empower event-centered creators, developers, and users alike by infusing digital content with immersive space visualization, thereby enhancing the overall experience within the metaverse. Event-Driven Architecture: LuluLand operates on a sophisticated event-driven architecture, which means that it can respond dynamically to user interactions and changes within the metaverse. This architecture ensures that the platform remains adaptable and can accommodate the rapidly evolving nature of the open metaverse. Signature Event: Xmas Eve Miracle, A Love is Forever, Xmas Moon, NFT|DAY Metaverse, and Metaverse Symphony with HK Phil. Immersive Space Visualization: At the core of LuluLand's capabilities is its ability to provide immersive space visualization. This feature allows users to engage with digital content in a way that blurs the lines between the virtual and physical worlds. Whether it's exploring a virtual landscape, interacting with virtual objects, or attending virtual events, users can do so in a visually stunning and immersive environment. Virtual Space Coverage: Apple Vision Pro OS, The Sandbox Games Empowering Digital Content: LuluLand empowers digital content creators by offering tools and resources that enable them to bring their ideas to life in the metaverse. Flagship Content tools: LuluLand Advertisement Integration with the Open Metaverse: LuluLand seamlessly integrates with the broader open metaverse ecosystem, fostering interoperability and accessibility. Users can explore content from various creators and platforms while maintaining a consistent and immersive experience. Covering Metaverse: Apple Vision Pro, The Sandbox, Matrix World, Decentraland Event Hosting and Participation: LuluLand serves as a hub for hosting and participating in events within the open metaverse. Whether it's concerts, conferences, exhibitions, or social gatherings, the platform facilitates the creation and management of events, ensuring that they are engaging and visually captivating. Signature Event: Xmas Eve Miracle, A Love is Forever, Xmas Moon, NFT|DAY Metaverse, and Metaverse Symphony with HK Phil. Community Building: LuluLand recognizes the importance of community within the metaverse. The platform includes features for social interaction, networking, and collaboration, allowing users to connect with like-minded individuals, form communities, and work together on creative projects. NFT Collection: LuluLand Genesis Pass, SKNOW ( Unpublished). LuluLand is a pioneering tech platform that plays a pivotal role in shaping the open metaverse by elevating digital content through immersive space visualization and event-driven functionality. It empowers content creators, fosters community engagement, and seamlessly integrates with the broader metaverse ecosystem, offering users a transformative and visually stunning metaverse experience.

Aug 1, 2021
At YouPage, we provide a comprehensive suite of tools and services to enhance your online presence and streamline your digital interactions. Our platform offers a range of features designed to empower individuals and businesses with creative solutions for email signatures, link management, custom domains, secure file sharing, vCards and calendar events, mini-webpage and biolink building, AI-generated images, audio transcriptions, AI chat assistance, and detailed link and page analytics. With the uPage Mini-Webpage/Biolink Builder, you can easily build and customize miniature single-page webpages (uPages) without any coding knowledge. Choose from a variety of elegant and professionally-designed templates or extensively customize your page layouts, insert multimedia elements, and create mobile-friendly landing pages optimized for different screen sizes. Whether you want to showcase your personal brand, portfolio, or business services, uPage's Mini-Webpage/Biolink Builder provides a versatile solution. Share your pages via memorable URLs and brilliant QR codes. With our Email Signatures feature, you can effortlessly create and design professional email signatures using our intuitive editor. Customize your signature with advanced creative options, and easily download it as HTML or copy and paste it into your preferred email client(s). Our Link Manager allows you to create memorable and fully trackable URLs by converting any link into customizable shortlinks. Gain robust analytics and insights into user access and audience engagement data whether you want to invite prospects to a LinkedIn event or share links to your website or resources, u.Page's Link Manager provides you with elegant and custom-designed shortlinks using reputable domain names to create the perfect brand image. Connect custom domains to your u.Page account with our Custom Domains feature, enabling you to use personalized URLs across various u.Page tools, including the Link Manager and uPage Mini-Webpage/Biolink Builder. This functionality will enhance your web pages, shortlinks, secure file sharing, vCards, calendar event links, and QR codes. Ensure secure and controlled file sharing with our Secure File Sharing feature. Use custom links for instant and protected file sharing, schedule content availability, set access passwords, apply expiration dates, limit access to specific geographies, and track engagement metrics. This feature is ideal for sharing documents, images, or other files with multiple recipients while maintaining data control and visibility. Effortlessly transfer contact information (vCards) and publish calendar event invitations using our vCards & Calendar Events feature. Utilize memorable URLs or custom-designed QR codes to share contacts and events, allowing visitors to instantly download your contact information or add your calendar event to their phone's calendar application. Our AI-generated Images feature allows you to generate unique images based on specific criteria. Select from various art styles and artists, and let our AI create images reminiscent of their works. Convert audio files into written transcriptions seamlessly using our AI technology with the Audio Transcriptions feature. Easily transcribe recorded interviews, meetings, lectures, podcasts, and more. Enhance your customer support and engagement with our AI Chat Assistant. Customize the chat assistant to align with your branding and specific requirements. Gain valuable insights into user engagement with our Link & Page Analytics feature. View comprehensive data on user interactions, device types, locations, browsers, and more. Gather important data through custom mini webpages or biolink pages, and insert social media and UTM tracking pixels to monitor and optimize user interactions and conversions. With our Products & Services feature, you can seamlessly sell products or services through modules on your uPages. Integrate popular payment processors for secure online payments, manage transactions, and track payment history. Efficiently organize and manage your projects with our Projects & Teams feature. Access, edit, and track the performance of your created content, and easily share and assign access to team members for collaborative work on projects, links, uPages, analytics, and other u.Page content. At u.Page, we empower individuals and businesses to create a strong online presence, streamline digital interactions, and optimize engagement through our comprehensive suite of tools and services. Syntheticus Logo
Syntheticus
1-10
Jul 1, 2021
Data is the world's most valuable resource and the backbone of the digital economy. However, data's full potential is actually not unlocked. Did you know that only 1% of the world's data is being analysed, while the rest remains untapped? Regulations around security, privacy, trust and ethics hinder access to enough valuable data for collaboration at scale. Syntheticus was founded in 2020 to unlock the power of data and protect privacy. The solution to that is synthetic data. Synthetic data is artificially generated and mimics the real-world data while preserving utility and privacy. In a nutshell: real-world data is collected, synthetic data is created. Synthetic data is poised to revolutionize the way the world democratizes access to data. Syntheticus leverages and orchestrates advanced Privacy-Enhancing Technologies such as Generative AI, Differential Privacy and Trusted Execution Environment (Confidential Computing). Syntheticus empowers customers to turn sensitive data from a liability into an asset by enabling them to share & monetize data and ML models in a privacy preserving way. The multi-type data orchestration platform provides seamless integrations with existing systems and maintains strong enterprise-grade data protection. Public and private organisations around the world trust Syntheticus to push the boundaries. Member of the ‘Nvidia Inception’ programs. ETH AI Center affiliated startup. IMD Competition Winner 2022. Successful financing completion from the prestigious Hammerteam Growth Accelerator led by Ariel Lüdi. Synthetic Data, Data Privacy, Deep Learning, GDPR, SaaS, Data Anonymization, Machine Learning, AI, Cloud, PrivacyTech, HIPAA, Data Analytics, PII, Personally Identifiable Information, Private Data Analysis, and Privacy Shield

"Solomon Codes" stands on three pillars: 1. Artificial Intelligence (natural language processing) - for the value creation 2. Tokenization - for the equitable value distribution between all contributors 3. Decentralization (DAO) - to make science fairly available globally. Our solution Solomon Codes is a fully automated and configurable scientific B2B SaaS platform. It is especially valuable for CEOs of small- or mid-sized companies in the worldwide chemical-, life- and computer science industries. In their jobs, they mostly depend on low-accuracy keyword searches conducted by a group of high-paid researchers. Our company offers an alternative that allows us to significantly increase the rate and value of any scientific research starting from the first search in the standard version or within five working days for a version configured by the Solomon Codes experts to a company or research-specific field of interest. In contrast to our competitors, our solution eliminates non-value adding market participants such as Elsevier, Springer, etc., by combining AI to enhance the customer's search results and tokenization for rewarding scientists (authors and reviewers). Like Spotify, the Solomon Codes improves the value for all parties participating on the platform by combining proven technologies in an industry ready for radical change. What Solomon Codes does: 1. Increasing venture flow for VCs through earlier insights on breakthrough scientific discoveries thanks to a fully configurable AI-powered semantic search 2. Increasing corporate profitability & competitiveness through better search result quality in less time, thanks to an AI-powered semantic search (NLP) 3. Equitable value distribution among all contributors: authors, reviewers, universities, businesses, thanks to tokenization 4. Fair & competitive pricing for universities from established and emerging countries in the scientific community

Solomon Codes Logo
Solomon Codes
1-10
Jun 2021
"Solomon Codes" stands on three pillars: 1. Artificial Intelligence (natural language processing) - for the value creation 2. Tokenization - for the equitable value distribution between all contributors 3. Decentralization (DAO) - to make science fairly available globally. Our solution Solomon Codes is a fully automated and configurable scientific B2B SaaS platform. It is especially valuable for CEOs of small- or mid-sized companies in the worldwide chemical-, life- and computer science industries. In their jobs, they mostly depend on low-accuracy keyword searches conducted by a group of high-paid researchers. Our company offers an alternative that allows us to significantly increase the rate and value of any scientific research starting from the first search in the standard version or within five working days for a version configured by the Solomon Codes experts to a company or research-specific field of interest. In contrast to our competitors, our solution eliminates non-value adding market participants such as Elsevier, Springer, etc., by combining AI to enhance the customer's search results and tokenization for rewarding scientists (authors and reviewers). Like Spotify, the Solomon Codes improves the value for all parties participating on the platform by combining proven technologies in an industry ready for radical change. What Solomon Codes does: 1. Increasing venture flow for VCs through earlier insights on breakthrough scientific discoveries thanks to a fully configurable AI-powered semantic search 2. Increasing corporate profitability & competitiveness through better search result quality in less time, thanks to an AI-powered semantic search (NLP) 3. Equitable value distribution among all contributors: authors, reviewers, universities, businesses, thanks to tokenization 4. Fair & competitive pricing for universities from established and emerging countries in the scientific community

Vetwing Logo
Vetwing
1-10
Sep 2021
Vetwing Startup is a provider of products and services based on AI & IOT to increase the production and better management of poultry farms. The first product of the startup is a smart digital broiler scale with the ability to measure the average weight, number of chickens, temperature, humidity, ammonia gas, and light intensity. This scale is located in broiler houses and sends data to the vetwing platform. Data is analyzed by machine learning algorithms. The most appropriate management solution to the climate and the prevalence of disease in each region is suggested to the poultry farmer and displayed on a personal dashboard. The purpose of this startup is to offer products and services based on artificial intelligence and big data in the poultry industry for the whole food chain, from farm to fork

Weeki Logo
Weeki
11-50
Jun 1, 2021
Weeki is a multi-platform, fully online SaaS (Software as a Service) application that provides a collaborative virtual whiteboard in the cloud. It was created to facilitate the exchange, collaboration and structuring of scientific information. Using Weeki, users such as professors, researchers and students can centralize their scientific content in an intuitive, customizable and secure visual space. The main objective of the application is to create theoretical or applied scientific models to solve technical-scientific problems. Weeki's virtual whiteboard provides an infinitely zoomable workspace, allowing users to represent and organize their ideas, concepts, thoughts, and data in a visual way. The application promotes collaboration by allowing users to share, brainstorm and work together on projects and thought patterns. The collaborative aspect of Weeki also allows users to exchange philosophical, business or human views, thus promoting the confrontation and mutual enrichment of ideas. The platform encourages the exchange of data and the evolution of knowledge by offering a massive and secure storage for the visualization of scientific data. Different types of objects can be added to the table, such as files, notes, shapes, diagrams, media, equations and bibliographic references. In addition, it is possible to include contact information for people, schools, laboratories and/or companies to establish a complete list of reference actors and stakeholders that could add value to the project. Weeki is a deeptech startup that integrates artificial intelligence to make the user experience more interactive and productive. The application uses AI features to optimize the organization of information, recommending to the user the right information and references (it goes on the web and recommends the right sources), allowing users to be more efficient and creative in their work. The interface is designed in a neuro-ergonomic way, offering a fun and ergonomic work experience. The information on the whiteboard is organized into different zones, which are in turn organized into several distinct layers. Weeki is much more than just an application. In addition to its collaborative virtual whiteboard, Weeki is also a marketplace, a place to exchange services and a training platform. It offers users the possibility to propose and participate in courses, creating a dynamic community of experts and learners. Thus, Weeki is positioned as a hub for users to meet and exchange ideas, providing a platform where they can not only collaborate on the virtual whiteboard, but also expand their knowledge by participating in courses and benefiting from the expertise of other users. This combination of features makes Weeki not only a working tool, but also a dynamic space where the community can grow and enrich each other. On Weeki, users have the freedom to create their own templates or courses that they can then sell to other users. At the same time, they can also participate in templates and courses proposed by other users. This interaction between members of the community helps to foster exchanges, encourage meetings and stimulate collaborative work. In a nutshell, Weeki is an innovative online application that offers a collaborative virtual whiteboard in the cloud, designed for professionals and students in the scientific field. It aims to facilitate the exchange, collaboration and organization of scientific information, while promoting creativity and efficiency through artificial intelligence features.
E-Commerce, Education, Information Technology, Internet, Service Industry, Software

guny is a mobile app that compiles all Trusted Sites into one place. In the market for beauty products sold online. Guny is attempting to address two major problems. Guny has two major problems to contend with. To begin, some marketplaces reduce their prices to compete with other players, making it difficult for buyers to choose the best option. Second, the luxury beauty industry is rife with knockoffs and counterfeits. Guny's solution is to save you time by using artificial intelligence to search the entire web for the cheapest and most reliable option. We employ static cameras and drones to provide real-time monitoring and detection, enhancing safety measures. Our team of experts is dedicated to improving response rates and using machine learning models for efficient fire detection. Our Services Our Services Improve Response Rate One of the key advantages of our fire detection system is its ability to significantly improve response rates in the event of a wildfire outbreak. By leveraging state-of-the-art technology and advanced algorithms, our system can detect potential fire incidents with unparalleled speed and accuracy. This rapid detection enables authorities and emergency responders to be alerted promptly, allowing them to initiate critical actions such as evacuations, fire suppression, and resource allocation in a timely manner. By improving response rates, we aim to minimize the spread and impact of wildfires, ultimately enhancing the safety of affected communities and the preservation of natural landscapes. iDataX stands as an innovative provider of digital technologies and services, delivering scalable solutions tailored to businesses of every scale. Born out of the collaborative efforts of technology experts working on some of the real problems baffling the world today. We started in 2016 under the aegis of the Ministry of SDE, Government of India as "The Digital Advisory Collective" where we provided consulting and competence development programs to an array of partners like the National Informatics Centre (NIC), Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEFCC), Ministry of Power, National e-Governance Division (NeGD), Digital India Corporation, Skill Development Corporation (NSDC), Ministry of Health and Family Welfare and others in the public sector (both central and state governments). We also worked with standards organizations, data governance bodies, and industry associations like WCCD ( World Council of Cities Data), Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC), International Data Spaces Association (IDSA), etc. Later becoming a separate entity in 2021, we expanded our offering to various industries in the corporate segment too. Our expertise extends to providing consulting services and tailored solutions for process optimization to major corporate entities across diverse sectors, including Manufacturing, Health Services, Logistics, and Automotive. We specialize in streamlining various operations, encompassing real functions such as finance, supply chain management, human resources, and customer relationship management. Enterprise brands like Samsung, Zomato, vivo, and Swiggy uses Gan.ai to run hyper-personal video campaigns with celebrities, leaders, and other stakeholders, calling out users' names, locations, order items, nearby stores, etc— maximizing CTRs, ROI & impact of campaigns. Whether it’s email, SMS, social media, WhatsApp, pre-roll ads, IPTV, mobile apps, personalized checkout, landing pages, or anything brands require, Gan.ai integrates with it. Before Gan.ai, brands could only make personalized text-based campaigns, inserting the name of the user in an email or SMS, or at best as a text graphic inside a video. ORNA is an end-to-end incident response automation platform for small and midsize businesses that helps streamline or automate detection, response, and even prevention of cyberattacks on the organization's assets, all in a single tool with live 24/7 specialist support. The platform monitors cloud, on-premises, and hybrid assets (such as servers, network devices, workstations, IoT devices, and more) the organization is looking to protect around the clock, but also brings together overarching cyber incident response across all business functions, such as legal, HR, communications, and others; as well as automates evidence collection, communications, vulnerability management, and more. Main features include: Threat detection: 24/7 automated AI-led detection, triage, and containment of external and internal threats in an estimated 1/80,000s of a second. Incident response: if a threat becomes significant, ORNA invokes automated, attack scenario-specific Playbooks that cover all necessary actions across your business. ORNA guides your team across identification, containment, recovery, evidence preservation, reporting, out-of-band communications activities, and more with a single goal - reduce financial and reputation damage to your business. Threat prevention: ORNA contains NIST-based compliance, asset risk and vulnerability management, team management, IR/DR/BCP process creation, team training, and other functions designed to help you prevent threats from actualizing in the first place.

Niiw Tecnologia e Inteligência de Negócios Ltda Logo
Niiw Tecnologia e Inteligência de Negócios Ltda
11-50
Nov 25, 2021
O Niiw Open Economy! Open Data! atua no setor de tecnologia de dados de consumo de consumo, oferecendo um serviço (SaaS) que coleta, categoriza e higieniza os dados de consumo do ponto físico em tempo real a partir de bases (Big Data) das receitas estaduais (NFCe - em todo o Brasil) e federais (NFe) e outras bases de dados relacionadas a bens de consumo duráveis e não-duráveis. O Niiw auxilia as organizações na tomada de decisões gerenciais (Módulo de Entrada de NFe - ERPs) através de projetos de Analitycs, IA e Machine Learning, em automatização de fluxos de reembolsos corporativos e no engajamento de usuários nas plataformas digitais através do Módulo de Controle de Gastos (PFM - "Personal Financial Management") através da Coleta, Categorização e Higienização de Dados de Documentos Fiscais (NFCe e NFE) e as integra junto as ações de ESG e de RH (Educação Financeira - Bem-Estar - Saúde Mental), assim como junto a Campanhas de Premiações, Fidelização e Pesquisas de Preços em tempo real. Endereçamos o Problema: Oceano inexplorado de dados de consumo sem uso em prol da Sociedade e Organizações e transformar esses dados em informações que impactem as pessoas e as organizações. Nossos ICPs (Perfis de Clientes): Empresas de ERP / Reembolsos Corporativos Empresas de Campanhas e Incentivos (Trade Marketing, Fidelização & Premiação) Empresas que possuem Super Apps (Bancos, Utilities, Smart Cities e outros Super Apps) Modelo de Negócios: Canais - B2B2B Bilhetagem de APIs (SaaS) - Preço de Lista: (R$ 0,25) White Label (SaaS) - PFM ------------------- ENGLISH VERSION "Niiw Open Economy! Open Data! operates in the consumer data technology sector, providing a service (SaaS) that collects, categorizes, and cleans real-time consumer data from physical points of sale based on extensive datasets from state (NFCe - across Brazil) and federal (NFe) revenues, as well as other databases related to durable and non-durable consumer goods. Niiw assists organizations in managerial decision-making (via the NFe Entry Module - ERPs) through Analytics, AI, and Machine Learning projects, automates corporate reimbursement workflows, and engages users on digital platforms through the Expense Control Module (PFM - "Personal Financial Management") by Collecting, Categorizing, and Cleaning Data from Fiscal Documents (NFCe and NFE). Additionally, it integrates with ESG and HR initiatives (Financial Education - Well-being - Mental Health), as well as real-time pricing surveys and loyalty and award campaigns. We address the problem of an unexplored ocean of consumer data that is unused for the benefit of society and organizations, by transforming this data into information that impacts people and organizations. Our ICPs (Customer Profiles) include: ERP / Corporate Reimbursement Companies Campaign and Incentive Companies (Trade Marketing, Loyalty & Awards) Companies with Super Apps (Banks, Utilities, Smart Cities, and other Super Apps) Our Business Model includes B2B2B channels, API billing (SaaS) with a list price of R$0.25, and White Label (SaaS) for PFM."

API-Verse Logo
API-Verse
11-50
Dec 1, 2021
Lightpaper: https://api-verse.com/litepaper The API-Verse as a platform has the main goal of simplifying the development of all the blockchain-based projects present in our ecosystem using state of the art data analytics and artificial intelligence. It is a comprehensive solution that significantly reduces the cost of entry into the blockchain, Web3, and Defi market by providing data in a way that is familiar to developers that have not yet found themselves interacting with the world of blockchain technology. For projects that already have experience in extracting and analyzing blockchain data, it provides access to a quick and costless way of gathering that data, allowing them to focus on solving business problems rather than working on the supporting infrastructure, which tends to consume a lot of project resources and delay the implementation of core functions. It’s crucial to note that the API-Verse allows access to not only real-time data but also historical data, making it very easy to spot trends, bottoms, peaks, cyclic movements and other community behaviors that would otherwise require a heavy amount of research to outline. Our API-Verse consists of several interconnected solutions that together provide multiple comprehensive solutions to common and uncommon business problems. These solutions are a combination of a JSON-RPC API (own nodes), storage analysers, blockchain indexers, front-end SDK, a relayer mechanism, and a validator. The indexer allows you to access and analyze on-chain data that was previously only available in a difficult-to-access way (or sometimes even impossible to obtain) and directly answer business questions and needs. The combination of the indexer and relayer allows not only to effectively detect abnormal behaviours but also to react quickly if those behaviours aren’t in line with your project guidelines, meaning that the analysis of the data won’t only provide you with new business opportunities, it will also potentially protect against malicious attacks from third parties, or, more commonly, from bots. The relayer also allows to automate the execution of cyclic activities that previously required either manual execution or the private key storage of the activity followed by the need of performing operations directly from the application backend. In conclusion, API-Verse is a comprehensive platform that provides a cost-effective and straightforward solution for businesses looking to enter the blockchain market. With its powerful range of solutions, businesses can easily access real-time and historical blockchain data, detect abnormal behaviors, and automate cyclic activities. These features make API-Verse an essential tool for businesses looking to gain a competitive edge in the blockchain market.
Blockchain, Information Technology, Service Industry, Software, Web3
Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland
API-Verse: an AI-powered solution that streamlines development, creating seamless and secure blockchain apps & data analysis for businesses.

Our platform offers a reliable digital asset trading environment, allowing creators to tokenize their digital arts, images, designs, articles, and content with ease. Powered by blockchain technology, our NFT platform ensures the authenticity, provenance, and ownership of digital assets, providing both creators and collectors with confidence in their transactions. By immutably recording ownership and transaction history on the blockchain, we eliminate the risk of fraud and counterfeit in the digital art market, fostering trust and transparency among all participants. With NFT Articz, creators gain access to a global marketplace where they can showcase their work, reach a broader audience, and monetize their digital creations through tokenization. Our platform offers intuitive tools for minting, buying, selling, and trading NFTs, empowering creators to unlock new revenue streams and establish themselves in the burgeoning NFT ecosystem. For collectors and enthusiasts, NFT Articz provides a curated marketplace featuring a diverse range of digital assets, from digital art and collectibles to virtual real estate and gaming assets. Our platform offers a secure and user-friendly interface for discovering, acquiring, and managing NFTs, enabling collectors to build valuable digital collections with confidence. At NFT Articz, we are committed to driving innovation and fostering creativity in the digital art space. ALPHS Logo
ALPHS
11-50
Nov 15, 2021
ALPHS is a fast-growing privately held organization with a business valuation of $7 million as of 2023, Forbes estimated. The inspirational success story of the empire redirects to Ashini Gogoi, an ex-Meta employee, who haphazardly started it as a lifestyle community on Instagram in January 2021 as per an investigation by CNN—Forbes declared that he is a young yet enigmatic self-made CEO. Following his vision in August 2020, Ashini managed to take a loan capital of US$40,000 from his friends and family, his company started making headlines in major publications for the first time in November 2022, when the company signed a contract with the American rapper, Wiz Khalifa. The company is listed as a high-profile organization on Crunchbase and is actively offering its services in Tier 1 countries as of 2023—a statistical analysis showed that 87% of its customer base is women from the United States, United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, and Italy. The company's website gets active during major festivals only and consumers can purchase for a limited duration of seven days, hence selling out very quickly—their most affordable models that hold their value start between $850 and $1,200. "ALPHS Inc. is one of the most secretive young companies in corporate history next to the giant Rolex," says the American business newspaper, The Wall Street Journal. Reports suggest that Ashini took down several notable articles including Forbes, CNN, WSJ—while his organization was under suspicion by April 2023—the company claimed that their products were meticulously made and they had consistently maintained their values. The company has drawn criticism from multiple sources, with questions raised about its secretive nature, and faced numerous allegations on whether their business was legal—including a handful of law firms in the financial investigation—a rigorous background check was done which publicized that they operate as an online retailer—with the approval of the Jewelers Vigilance Committee—the materials used by the company were declared legitimate in October 2022. The company also produces high-quality films titled, "Inspired by best-selling novels" for customer retention and is investing enormous funds in the development of artificial intelligence. ALPHS headquarters were officially shifted from Hyderabad, India to Milan, Italy in March 2023 under the guidance of Y Combinator, the lead investor of the company. As of 2023, the company has reportedly signed agreements with eleven prominent stars and models for endorsing its products.

TREEO | Fairventures Digital GmbH Logo
TREEO | Fairventures Digital GmbH
11-50
Nov 8, 2021
To help set companies on the path to net zero emissions, TREEO provides them with accurate and traceable data about our high-quality, nature-based Carbon Dioxide Removals (CDRs) while we empower tree growers through the TREEO Technology and access to the carbon market. The TREEO carbon product can be split into two main steps: carbon capture and carbon storage. Trees capture CO2 from our atmosphere and store it as carbon while releasing the oxygen we breathe. Through the TREEO technology, we empower tree growers in the Global South and finance reforestation and restoration projects. We then guarantee the carbon is stored in the long term with harvested wood products and biochar. TREEO guarantees full transparency through our single-tree monitoring technology. Solving the climate crisis requires scalable and inclusive carbon removal solutions. For millions of smallholder farmers, climate finance is currently inaccessible. To monetize their carbon removals, they need reliable and easy-to-use monitoring technologies, required for transparency and trust. It is our mission to provide farmers with exactly that: A single-tree monitoring technology, empowering local communities to generate verified carbon removals and connecting them to the global carbon market. With these partnerships and the TREEO Technology, we can then provide companies transparent CDRs to live up to their corporate responsibility with the data to prove their impact.
Apps, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Forestry, GreenTech, Software
Stuttgart, Baden-Wurttemberg, Germany
TREEO provides accurate & traceable nature-based Carbon Dioxide Removals (CDRs) while empowering tree growers through the TREEO Technology.
199,066

Greenitio Logo
Greenitio
1-10
Nov 1, 2021
Greenitio is transforming the industry with its AI-driven platform technology to produce functional biopolymers from abundant natural resources as a sustainable alternative to petrochemical polymers, all while preserving their inherent bioactivity and functions. Although natural biopolymers like plant proteins and polysaccharides can replace certain synthetic polymers, in most cases, there's a scarcity of high-performance biopolymers with properties like oil-soluble, water-resistant, flexible, strength, etc and options that meet the required specifications are rare. Few candidates derived from bio-based monomers or chemical processes using natural small molecules fulfil these criteria, but their production often compromises bioactivity and biodegradability. In traditional chemistry, functionalizing biomacromolecules into useful biopolymers has been a complex challenge, often leading to low yields and high costs when balancing performance and bioactivity. However, Greenitio's innovative technology overcomes these hurdles by implementing a biogenic process. This groundbreaking approach converts low-value, underperforming biomacromolecules into high-value, high-performance functional biopolymers sustainably and affordably—previously deemed unattainable. Remarkably, Greenitio's methodology not only preserves but enhances the natural bioactivity of biomacromolecules, unlocking the boundless potential for innovation and possibilities. Our biopolymers offer superior bioactivity and health benefits that surpass synthetic alternatives. Competing technologies only prioritize performance. We proudly offer a rare combination of performance and bioactivity at an affordable price.
B2B, Chemical, CleanTech, Cosmetics, Green Consumer Goods, GreenTech
Singapore, Central Region, Singapore
Developing bio-based ingredients replacing microplastics and polymeric ingredients.

Our core offerings include: A) An 'interactive autobiography builder' app that empowers users to easily record their life's story and engage in a game-like experience, answering questions and prompts about their lives. B) An AI-powered chat (ALMA) that guides friends and family members to interact with the storyteller by asking them questions and receiving their answers. WhoTeach Logo
WhoTeach
11-50
Dec 2021
WhoTeach is a B2B intelligent digital learning platform that helps training institutions and companies to create and deliver high-quality online courses by optimizing the use of resources. The platform enables an easy management of synchronous and asynchronous training through the synergy between its components, their modularity and adaptability to various training contexts. It is equipped with AI to support teachers and experts in creating and managing training paths in a customized manner. The platform consists of four distinct and individually usable modules: ● WT Artificial Intelligence is an innovative Recommendation System (RS) developed with Machine Learning and Deep Learning techniques, which supports lecturers in searching and selecting teaching material, using resources contained in internal or external repositories. The Recommendation System suggests the most suitable resources for the course based on the rules set by the lecturer. ● WT Learning Management System is a learning management system that allows high quality courses to be created and delivered asynchronously, with flexibility in course structure and materials to be made available. In addition, it offers a number of sophisticated learning verification and learner activity tracking systems. ● WT Live is a tool for delivering training in synchronous mode, through virtual classrooms equipped with numerous features to facilitate interaction between teacher and learners and between learners themselves. The virtual classrooms offer the possibility of creating break-out rooms, where learners can work in groups, and have tracking tools to certify learner attendance. ● WT Social E-Portfolio is a tool for tracking skills and publishing information related to educational and professional experiences, which also allows students to share ideas, create communities of practice and interact with other students, lecturers and experts.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Digital Signage, E-Learning, Training
Milano, Lombardia, Italy

WhoTeach Logo
WhoTeach
11-50
Dec 2021
WhoTeach is a B2B intelligent digital learning platform that helps training institutions and companies to create and deliver high-quality online courses by optimizing the use of resources. The platform enables an easy management of synchronous and asynchronous training through the synergy between its components, their modularity and adaptability to various training contexts. It is equipped with AI to support teachers and experts in creating and managing training paths in a customized manner. The platform consists of four distinct and individually usable modules: ● WT Artificial Intelligence is an innovative Recommendation System (RS) developed with Machine Learning and Deep Learning techniques, which supports lecturers in searching and selecting teaching material, using resources contained in internal or external repositories. The Recommendation System suggests the most suitable resources for the course based on the rules set by the lecturer. ● WT Learning Management System is a learning management system that allows high quality courses to be created and delivered asynchronously, with flexibility in course structure and materials to be made available. In addition, it offers a number of sophisticated learning verification and learner activity tracking systems. ● WT Live is a tool for delivering training in synchronous mode, through virtual classrooms equipped with numerous features to facilitate interaction between teacher and learners and between learners themselves. The virtual classrooms offer the possibility of creating break-out rooms, where learners can work in groups, and have tracking tools to certify learner attendance. ● WT Social E-Portfolio is a tool for tracking skills and publishing information related to educational and professional experiences, which also allows students to share ideas, create communities of practice and interact with other students, lecturers and experts.
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Digital Signage, E-Learning, Training
Milano, Lombardia, Italy

Our solutions cover wide ranges of critical infrastructures including oil and gas, power grid network, renewable energy, telecommunication, construction, public safety, and more. Qrisco Inc. is a company that designs, develops, manufactures, and sells smart electric vehicles with a mission to build a sustainable and clean future. Qrisco is reaching beyond what’s possible by digitally placing an exceptionally high priority on efficiency, Data, and Electricity which in turn drives our brand to improve the overall automobile experience. Providing safer mobility, Qrisco is driving innovations in the next generation of technologies with analytics, connectivity, autonomous driving, and artificial intelligence. To simplify customers’ mobility experience. At Qrisco we aim to drive Smart Electric Vehicle transformation with technology and data and shape the mobility experience. committing to a greener and more sustainable environmentally friendly future. As emissions from African transport surge, a drastic rise in vehicle ownership, a growing population, increased urbanization, and a rising middle class. governments are finding ways to encourage a shift to cleaner, healthier electric vehicles. Unless there is a disruption to business-as-usual, the related emissions will also increase. This is where Qrisco electric vehicles (EVs) come in. Sub-Saharan Africa and other developing countries urgently need a transport alternative to stave off the growing burden of fuel dependency and subsidies, as well as an electricity storage solution to leverage their abundant renewable energy resources. Qrisco, powered by electricity and running on battery storage, offers a potential solution to both these problems. Furthermore, as Qrisco EVs produce no direct emissions, they will improve the air quality of Africa’s congested cities.

To make this possible, We have created a concept of a socket worn as a glove that provides comfort, flexibility and easy adjustment. We want to change the fact that there is an 80% of prosthesis rejection because (in their own words) “they make them feel disabled”. This is the age of Knowledge graphs Like all new technology they have roots deep in the past: our founder, Dr Andy, worked on his first Knowledge graph in 1998. But new developments in Graph Databases and cloud computing have made Knowledge Graphs a practical reality. CanSay Logo
CanSay
11-50
Sep 16, 2021
Today, millions of companies around the world are teaching almost 400M frontline workers to communicate with customers using outdated technology. Usually, this is face-to-face roleplaying with a coach, mentor, or supervisor. The online training alternative is scalable but doesn't develop practical communication skills, on top of being tedious. Quality of customer communications directly affects business performance, and companies spend hundreds of billions of dollars on this type of face-to-face training. But this is expensive, inconsistent in quality, requires human resources and training schedules. We've digitalized this type of training. CanSay is a learning tool for creating interactive speech simulations with an AI companion, enabling effective and practical communication skills training and focusing on frontline workers within various sectors to increase sales and client satisfaction. CanSay simulations efficiently build up skills with speaking practice. They are involving, available anytime/anywhere, do not require human resources and can be fully managed in any corporate LMS.

Balanced News Summary Logo
Balanced News Summary
1-10
Nov 1, 2021
Balanced News Summary is a news source self-funded and created by an independent Australian researcher – we are not backed by any large companies or investors. The purpose of our website is to provide clarity and reunite communities, by identifying bias and offering equal analysis from both sides of the political spectrum. By presenting multiple perspectives from different publications, and by rating the bias of different news sources, Balanced News Summary frees people from 'filter bubbles' and algorithmic 'feedback loops' created by modern day technology. We believe this will result in readers becoming well informed on trending news, as well as becoming more open-minded towards conflicting opinions. Balanced News Summary uses Artificial Intelligence (AI) and machine learning to generate content 24/7, aggregated from multiple sources across the political spectrum. The founder has also created 4,000 posts dating back to 2007. We offer multiple perspectives on the political spectrum for each particular topic, so that you can read both sides and form your own opinion! We also offer 'quick read' news summaries to get you up to date with the news quickly and conveniently. We are big advocates for freedom of speech! Our services are available on the Google Play Store, Apple App Store, or you can visit our website.

Soon to be opened! We offer an online platform that provides a revolutionary solution for traders seeking capital to finance their trading activities. With an innovative approach, we offer traders the opportunity to take on challenging 'challenges', where they must achieve a predetermined return with a DEMO account (fake money account) without losing a fixed percentage of their capital. This provides traders with the opportunity to demonstrate their trading skills. One of the unique features of our platform is the use of demo accounts with 'fake money' during the execution of challenges. This allows traders to demonstrate their trading strategies to us without any capital risk. One of the key aspects of our platform is the advanced risk management system that is applied. By utilizing artificial intelligence and advanced analytics techniques, we can closely monitor traders' trading behavior and minimize risks. This ensures that only the most profitable traders are selected and supported, allowing the platform to provide a high return to investors. For profitable traders, we offer an attractive profit-sharing arrangement (70/30), allowing traders to retain a large portion of their profits. This ensures a fair and transparent collaboration between us and the traders, benefiting both parties from the platform's success. Overall, we offer an innovative and lucrative platform for traders to finance and grow their trading activities. With a combination of challenging challenges, advanced risk management techniques, and attractive profit-sharing, we are the ideal choice for traders seeking capital. We offer a trading platform of both DXTrader and CTrader for trader flexibility; since 03-01-2024, the largest (Metatrader) no longer supports Prop Firms; existing Prop Firms are actively transitioning, which presents the perfect opportunity to enter the market. Once the budget goal is reached, we will be active in the market within 4 months, after the AI system is built, a website is developed, and a suitable team with experience in customer service and profitable trading is selected. We expect to quickly build trust and capture a strong market position, partly due to the aforementioned halt of MetaTrader for Prop Firms. Well-known Prop Firms receive an average of 30 orders per day for DEMO accounts to qualify for a Funded account; this target audience is broad and always looking for an improved alternative that we can provide.
